src_text: we rolled out a special coronavirus disease (covid19) social relief of distress grant, which has reached some six million people to date.
tgt_text: hi simeke timali ta nhlayiso ta mpha lalo wa vaaki wa ( covid19) wo hlawuleka ta ntshikelelo, leti ti fikeleleke ntsevu wa timiliyoni ta vanhu kutafika sweswi.

src_text: this was done within weeks of the national state of disaster being declared.
tgt_text: leswi swi endliwile ku nga si hela mavhiki manga rimangani ya xiyimo xa rixaka xa mhangu lexi tivi siweke.

src_text: the scale of such an undertaking cannot be understated.
tgt_text: xikalu xa vutiboheleri byole byo xi nga ka xi nga tekeriwi ehansi.

src_text: to bring this system online there was extensive collaboration between the south african social security agency, south african revenue service, home affairs and many others.
tgt_text: ku endla leswaku sisiteme leyi yi kumeka eka inthanete ku vile na ntirhisano exikarhi ka ejensi ya timali ta nhlayiso wa vaaki ya afrikadzonga, vukorhokeri bya xibalo bya afrikadzonga, ti mhaka ta xikaya na van'wana vo tala.

src_text: we set up a fully automated application and disbursement process, and integrated multiple databases, including the national population register and the unemployment insurance fund (uif) database.
tgt_text: hi simeke xitirhisiwa lexi tilawulaka hi vutalo na phu rosese yo hakela, na tidatabe sinyingi leti pfanganisiweke, ku katsa na rhijisitara ra vanhu ra rixaka na databesi ya nkwama wa ndzindza khombo wa lava nga tirhiki (uif).

src_text: we set up new application channels like whatsapp and ussd, and created systems with the commercial banks to enable banking detail verification.
tgt_text: hi simeke tichanele to endla swikombelo eka tona tintshwa to fana na whatsapp na ussd, naswona hi tumbu luxe tisisiteme na tibangi ta swa bindzu ku endlela le swaku ku va na ntiyisiso wa vuxokoxoko byo banga.

src_text: this is a remarkable achievement in a very short space of time.
tgt_text: lowu i mfikelelo wo tivikana hi xinkadyana lexitsongo.

src_text: alongside the measures we took to protect and sustain livelihoods, we also supported ailing businesses.
tgt_text: ku fambisana na magoza lama hi ma tekeke ku sirhe lela na ku yisa emahlweni vutihanyisi, hi tlhele hi se ketela mabindzu lama a ma tikeriwa.

src_text: we provided relief to small businesses in the form of debt relief, finance, tax payment deferrals and other instruments.
tgt_text: hi nyike mphalalo eka mabindzu lamatsongo hi xivumbeko xa mphalalo wa swikweleti, timali na ku tlhelerisiwa endhaku ka tiha kelo ta xibalo na mitwanano yin'wana.

src_text: we implemented a covid19 loan guarantee scheme to enable businesses to meet their operational expenses during the lockdown, and are currently looking at how this scheme can reach more companies in need.
tgt_text: hi simeke xikimi xa ntiyi siso wa tiloni xa covid19 ku kotisa mabindzu ku fikelela swihakeleriwa swa wona swo tirha hi nkarhi wa ku pfale riwa, naswona eka nkarhi wa sweswi hi languta hilaha xikimi lexi xi nga kotaka ku fikelela hakona tikhamphani leti nga eku dingeni.

src_text: we provided income protection to workers and relief to business owners through the temporary employer relief scheme administered by the uif.
tgt_text: hi nyike nsirhelelo wa ma linghena eka vatirhi na mpha lalo eka van'wamabindzu hi ku tirhisa xikimi xa mphalalo wa vathori xa nkarhinyana lexi lawuriwaka hi uif.

src_text: these were all in direct response to an emergency and were by nature temporary.
tgt_text: leswi a ku ri angulo wo ko ngoma eka xilamulelamhangu naswona hi ntumbuluko a swi ri swa nkarhinyana.

src_text: some are now coming to an end, while others have been extended as the labour market recovers.
tgt_text: sweswi swin'wana swi le ku fikeni emakumu, kasi swin'wana swi ndlandlamukisiwile tani hiloko makete wa vatirhi wu ri karhi wu hlakarhela.

src_text: the measures we implemented went a long way towards protecting our society from the harsh winds of covid19.
tgt_text: magoza lama hi ma sime keke ma pfune swinene eka ku sirhelela rixaka ra ka hina eka mimoya ya tihanyi ya covid19 .

src_text: the additional grants helped to prevent millions of people from falling below the food poverty line.
tgt_text: timali ta nhlayiso to engetela ti pfune ku sivela ti miliyoni ta vanhu eka ku wela ehansi ka ntila wa vusweti bya swakudya.

src_text: had we not intervened to secure livelihoods and save businesses, the living conditions of our people and the circumstances of thousands of businesses would have been considerably worse.
tgt_text: loko a hi nga phalalangi ku sirhelela vutihanyisi na ku po nisa mabindzu, swiyimo swa ku hanya swa vanhu va ka hina na swiyimo swa magidi ma mabindzu a swi ta va swi nyanyile hi ndlela yo tivikana.

src_text: now we are in a transition from relief to recovery.
tgt_text: sweswi hi le ku cinceni ku suka eka mphalalo kuya eka nhlakarhelo.

src_text: the emergency measures we put in place have laid a firm foundation on which to rebuild our economy.
tgt_text: magoza ya xilamulela mhangu lama hi ma tekeke ma vumbile masungulo yo tiya lama hi faneleke ku aka ikhonomi ya hina hi vuntshwa ehenhla ka wona.

src_text: as our focus now shifts to the implementation of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, our priority will be to stimulate growth and create jobs.
tgt_text: tanihileswi nkongomo wa hina sweswi wu cincelaka eka nsimeko wa kungu ra ku akiwa hi vuntshwa na nhlakarhelo wa ikhonomi, xirhangana xa hina xi ta va ku hlohlotela ku kula na ku tumbuluxa mitirho.

src_text: there has already been progress in a number of areas.
tgt_text: se ku vile na ndzima leyi khatsiweke eka swiyenge swo hlayanyana.

src_text: we are seeing new funding commitments for infrastructure development following an infrastructure project roundtable last week.
tgt_text: hi le ku voneni ka vutibo heleri bya ku nyika timali byintshwa eka nhluvukiso wa swimakiwakulu endzhaku ka nkanerisano wa phurojeke wa swimakiwakulu vhiki leri nga hundza.

src_text: a number of employment programmes under the presidential employment stimulus have started.
tgt_text: minongonoko ya mitirho yo hlayanyana ehansi ka xihlohloteri xa mitirho xa le hofisini ya phuresidente yi sungurile.

src_text: we are pushing ahead with economic reforms in areas such as energy and telecommunications.
tgt_text: hi le ku yeni emahlweni na mipfuxeto ya ikhonomi eka swiyenge swo tanihi eneji na vuhlanganisi bya swa tiqingho.

src_text: plans are being converted to action and commitments are being reflected in jobs and opportunities.
tgt_text: makungu ma le ku hundzu riweni ya swiendlo naswona vutiboheleri byi le ku kombi siweni eka mitirho na swiva ndlanene.

src_text: it is all the more critical at this time, more so with the festive season approaching, that we do not become the architects of our own undoing.
tgt_text: i swa nkoka swonghasi hi nkarhi lowu, ngopfungopfu leswi nguva ya makhisimusi yi tshinelaka, leswaku hi nga vi vapfapfarhutapulani va ku wa ka hina.

src_text: the greatest vigilance is required from us all to keep the virus at bay.
tgt_text: vuxiyaxiya lebyikulukumba bya laveka eka hina hinkwe rhu ku endlela leswaku xitsongwatsongwana lexi xi fambela ekule.

src_text: a resurgence at any scale will not just dramatically reverse our health gains.
tgt_text: ku tlakuka hi xikalu xihi kumbe xihi a swi nga to tlhe risela ntsena endzhaku hi ndlela yo hlamarisa mivuyelo ya hina ya swa rihanyu.

src_text: it will choke the green shoots of economic recovery that have emerged, and take us back from spring to winter.
tgt_text: swi ta vunisa matluka ya rihlaza ya nhlakarhelo wa ikhonomi lama ya hlukeleke, naswona swi ta hi tlherisela endzhaku kusuka eka ximun'wana kuya eka xixika.

src_text: to prevent a second wave of covid19 infections, we must observe the public health guidelines that remain in place.
tgt_text: ku sivela gandlati ra vumbi rhi ra mitluletavuvabyi ya covid19 , hi boheka ku la ndzelela swiletelo swa riha nyu swa vaaki leswi nga sala swi ri eku tirheni.

src_text: when we fail to wear a mask at a social gathering, when we attend crowded events, we are not only putting ourselves and others at risk.
tgt_text: loko hi hluleka ku ambala xipfalaxikandza eka nhlenge letano ya vaaki, loko hi ya eka swiendleko leswi nga tala vanhu, a ho veka ntsena hina na van'wana enxungetweni.

src_text: we are also putting our economic recovery in jeopardy.
tgt_text: kambe hi tlhela hi veka nhla karhelo wa ikhonomi ya hina ekhombyeni.

src_text: let us all continue to play our part.
tgt_text: a hi yeni emahlweni hi tirha xiphemu xa hina.

src_text: the positive actions of wearing a mask, of maintaining social distancing and of regular hand washing helped us overcome the worst effects of the pandemic.
tgt_text: swiendlo leswinene swa ku ambala xipfalaxikandza, swa ku siya mpfhuka exikarhi ka vanhu na ku hlamba swandla nkarhi na nkarhi swi hi pfune ku hlula switandzhaku swo biha kutlula mpimo swa ntu ngukulu lowu.

src_text: they are still our best defence.
tgt_text: swa ha ri swona vusirheleri bya hina bya kahle swinene.

src_text: let us remember the sacrifices we all had to make to contain the spread of the virus in the early days.
tgt_text: a hi tsundzukeni vutitsoni lebyi hinkwerhu hi bohekeke ku byi endla ku kamanyeta ku hangalaka ka xitsongwatso ngwana lexi eka masiku ma le masungulweni.

src_text: even as most social and economic activity has resumed, we must still observe all the health measures.
tgt_text: hambiloko migingiriko ya vanhu na ikhonomi yo tala ya ha ku sungula, ha boheka ku va ha ha landzelela magoza ya swa rihanyu hinkwawo.

src_text: this is absolutely necessary if we are to rebuild our economy and put this crisis behind us.
tgt_text: nhlakarhelo wa vonaka evugimamusi bya afrikadzonga vukuzenzele unnamed mijakaranda yi le ku balekeni swi luva hi vutalo entsindza wa tiko, yi komba masungulo ya ximumu.

src_text: sa overcoming hiv and aids vukuzenzele unnamed as we continue our efforts to manage the devastating coronavirus pandemic, we cannot ignore the other public health challenges that our country faces.
tgt_text: afrikadzonga yi hlula hiv na aids vukuzenzele unnamed loko hi ya emahlweni na matshalatshala ya hina yo lawula ntungu wa xitsongwatsongwana xa khorona lowu onhaka swinene, a hi nge papalati mintlhontlho ya swa rihannyu ra vaaki yin’wana leyi tiko ra hina ri kongomanaka na yona.

src_text: for more than three dec ades, our country has been engaged in an ongoing struggle against hiv and aids, which has cost many lives and caused great hardship and suffering.
tgt_text: ku tlula makumenharhu wa malembe, tiko ra hina ri nghenelele eka nkayankayo lowu yaka emahlweni wo lwisana na hiv na aids leyi nga koxa vutomi bya vanhu votala, naswona yi tise ku tikeriwa lokukulu na nhlupheko.

src_text: since the outbreak of cov id19 in the country, with the nationwide lockdown and the pressure on our health facilities, many hiv , aids and tuberculosis services have suffered.
tgt_text: kusukela loko ku tumbuluke covid19 etikweni, na ku pfa riwa ka tiko hinkwaro na ntshikelelo eka switirhisiwankulu swa hina swa rihanyu, vukorhokeri byotala bya hiv , aids na rifuva byi salele endzhaku.

src_text: this has posed a challenge for people testing and starting antiretroviral treatment.
tgt_text: leswi swi tise ntlhontlho eka vanhu lava kamberiwaka na ku sungula vutshunguri bya antirhithirovhayirali.

src_text: many people found it difficult to collect their medicines and fewer people accessed other services, such as voluntary male medical circumcision.
tgt_text: vanhu votala a va tikeriwa ku ya teka mirhi ya vona, naswona vanhu va nga ri vangani a va ﬁ kelela vukorhokeri byin’wana byo fana na ku yimba ngoma ya vaxinuna ya le xibedhlele hi ku tinyiketela.

src_text: at the same time, there are many lessons that have been learnt from our public health response to the coronavirus pandemic that can strengthen our fight against hiv and tb.
tgt_text: eka nkarhi lowu fanaka, ku na tidyondzo totala leti nga dyondziwa kusuka eka kuangula ka swa rihanyu ra vaaki eka ntungu wa xitsongwatsongwana xa khorona leti nga tiyisisaka ku lwisana ka hina na hiv na tb.

src_text: south africa continues to have the largest number of people living with hiv in the world.
tgt_text: afrikadzonga yi ya emahlweni yi ri na nhlayo ya le henhla swinene ya vanhu lava hanyaka na hiv emisaveni.

src_text: it is encouraging, however, that over the last decade we made progress in reducing the number of new hiv infections in the population by nearly 60%.
tgt_text: hambiswiritano, swi tiyisa nhlana ku tiva leswaku eka malembe ya khume lawa ma nga hundza, hi humelerile eka ku hunguta nhlayo ya mitlulelo ya hiv leyintshwa eka vanhu va tiko hi kwalomu ka 60 wa tiphesente.

src_text: it is also encouraging that hiv infections in adolescent girls and young women have significantly declined in the last decade.
tgt_text: swi tlhela swi tiyisa nhlana leswaku mitlulelo ya hiv eka vanhwanyana va kondloandzidyi na vamanana lavantshwa yi hunguteke swinene eka malembe ya khume lawa ma nga hundza.

src_text: this is a crucial group because they are much more likely to be at risk of getting hiv .
tgt_text: lowu i ntlawa wa nkoka swinene hikuva va tala ku va eka nxungeto wa ku kuma hiv .

src_text: our treatment programme has contributed to a reduction in the number of deaths due to aids by 60%.
tgt_text: nongonoko wa hina wa vutshunguri wu hoxe xandla eka ku hunguta nhlayo ya mafu hikwalaho ka aids hi 60 wa tiphesente.

src_text: there has been a greater reduction in hivrelated deaths among young people.
tgt_text: ku ve na ku hunguteka lokukulu eka mafu lawa ma fambelanaka na hiv exikarhi ka vanhu lavantshwa.

src_text: it was possible to reduce the number of deaths because we, together with our partners, have rolled out an extensive antiretroviral programme reaching millions of people living with the disease.
tgt_text: swi olovile ku hunguta nhlayo ya mafu hikuva hina hi ri swin’we na vanakulorhii va hina hi tirhise nongonoko wa antirhithorivhayirali lowukulu lowu nga fikelela timiliyoni ta vanhu lava va hanyaka na mavabyi lawa.

src_text: at the beginning of the decade, our programme to prevent mother to child transmission (pmtct) of hiv had very low coverage.
tgt_text: ekusunguleni ka malembe ya khume, nongonoko wa hina wa ku sivela ku tlulela kusukela eka manana kuya eka n’wana (pmtct) wa hiv a wu va nga na mfikelelo wa tindhawu to tala.

src_text: now we have one of the highest rates of coverage of pmtct in southern africa, which has substantially reduced rates of infection among children.
tgt_text: sweswi hi na mpimo wa le henhla swinene wa mﬁ kelelo wa tindhwau to tala wa pmtct edzongeni wa afrika lowu nga hunguta mpimo wa mitlulelo swinene exikarhi ka vana.

src_text: while we have reduced deaths and new infections, we still are far from reaching the goal we committed ourselves in 2016 of achieving a 75% reduction in hiv infections by 2020. if we succeed in doing so, we are likely to end aids as a public health threat by 2030. unfortunately, we are not there yet.
tgt_text: hambileswi hi nga hunguta mafu na mitlulelo leyintshwa, ha ha ri kule na ku fikelela xikongomelo lexi hi nga tiboha eka xona hi 2016 xa ku ﬁ kelela ku hunguta mitlulelo ya hiv hi 75 wa tiphesente hi 2020. loko ho humelela eka ku endla tano, hi nga swi kota ku herisa aids tanihi nxungeto wa swa rihanyu ra vaaki hi 2030. hi ku pfumala nkateko, a hi se fika.

src_text: we have to do far more to ensure that young people are empowered to prevent infections, including through changing behaviour, accessing condoms and testing regularly.
tgt_text: hi fanele hi tirha swinene ku vona leswaku vanhu lavantshwa va nyikiwa matimba ya ku sivela mitlulelo, ku katsa ku cinca matikhomelo, ku ﬁ kelela tikhondhomu na ku kamberiwa nkarhi na nkarhi.

src_text: we need to make sure that everyone who is infected has access to treatment and care.
tgt_text: hi fanele hi vona leswaku munhu wun'wana na wun'wana loyi a tluleriweke hi mavabyi u na mﬁ kelelo wa swa vutshunguri na vuhlayiseki.

src_text: we need to work harder on hiv prevention among key populations, including sex workers, men who have sex with men, and people who inject drugs.
tgt_text: hi fanele hi tirha hi nkhinkhi hi mayelana na ku sivela hiv exikarhi ka vanhu va tiko va nkoka, ku katsa lava xavisaka miri, vavanuna lava va endlaka timhaka ta swa masangu na vavanuna van’wana na vanhu lava va titlhavaka hi swidzidziharisi.

src_text: we must end the stigma and discrimination towards these populations.
tgt_text: hi fanele hi herisa nhlekulo na xihlawuhlawu eka vanhu lava va tiko.

src_text: we cannot hope to end hiv if we ignore the needs, concerns and rights of any part of our population.
tgt_text: a hi nge vi na ntshembo wo herisa hiv loko hi papalata swilaveko, swivilelo na timfanelo ta xiphemu xihi kumbe xihi xa vanhu va tiko ra hina.

src_text: south africa needs to increase efforts to medically circumcise young men to reduce their risk of acquiring hiv .
tgt_text: afrikadzonga yi fanele yi tlakusa matshalatshala ya ku yimbisa vavanuna lavantshwa exibedhlele ku hunguta nxu ngeto wa vona wa ku kuma hiv .

src_text: unsafe circumcision should not leave young men with lifelong health problems, and no one should die from circumcision.
tgt_text: ku yimba ko kala ku nga hlayisekanga a ku fanelanga ku siya vavanuna lavantshwa na swiphiqo swa rihanyu swa vutomi hinkwabyo, naswona a ku na munhu loyi a faneleke a lova hikwalaho ka ku yimba ngoma.

src_text: we must make sure that young men have safe circumcision.
tgt_text: hi fanele hi vona leswa ku vavanuna lavantshwa va yimba ngoma hi vuhlayiseki.

src_text: we are encouraged by findings of a recent study on preexposure prophylaxis (prep).
tgt_text: hi tiyisiwa nhlana hi leswi kumiweke hi vulavisisi lebyi bya ha ku endliwaka hi mayelana na preexposure prophylaxis (prep).

src_text: unlike antiretroviral treatment that is given to people who are hiv positive, prep involves the regular use of antiretroviral drugs by hiv negative people to prevention infection.
tgt_text: handle ka vutshunguri bya antirhithorivhayirali lebyi nyikiwaka vanhu lava va nga na hiv , prep yi khumba matirhiselo ya nkarhi na nkarhi ya tiphilisi ta antirhithorivhayirali eka vanhu lava nga hava hiv ku sivela ku tluleriwa.

src_text: the study, conducted by scientists from the hiv prevention trials network, found that longacting injections once every eight weeks was better than the daily tablet used for hiv prevention.
tgt_text: vulavisisi lebyi endliweke hi vativi va sayense vo huma eka netiweke yo ringeta ku sivela hiv va kume leswaku mitlhavelo leyi tirhaka nkarhi wo leha kan’we eka mavhiki ya nhungu man’wana na man’wana ya atswa ku tlula philisi leyi nwiwaka siku na siku ku sivela hiv .

src_text: these findings have the potential to significantly strengthen our response to the epidemic.
tgt_text: leswi kumiweke leswi swi na vuswikoti bya ku tiyisisa ku angula ka hina eka ntungukulu.

src_text: if we are to succeed in ending aids as a public health threat within the next decade, we need to combine these medical breakthroughs with fundamental changes in behaviour.
tgt_text: loko hi ta humelela eka ku herisa aids tanihi nxungeto wa swa rihanyu ra vaaki eka malembe ya khume lawa ma landzelaka, hi fanele hi hlanganisa ku humelela loku ka swa vutshunguri na ku cinca ka nkoka ka matikhomelo.

src_text: we also need to tackle the economic and social conditions that contrib ute to high rates of infection.
tgt_text: swi lava hi tlhela hi lwisana na swiyimo swa ikhonomi na matshamelo ya vaaki leswi hoxaka xandla eka mpimo wa le henhla wa mitlulelo.

src_text: one of our central tasks is to empower adolescent girls and young women, educationally, economically and socially.
tgt_text: mitirho yin’wana ya hina ya nkoka i ku nyika vanhwanyana va kondloandzidyi na vamanana lavantshwa matimba ya swa dyondzo, swa ikhonomi na ku tihlanganisa na vanhu van’wana.

src_text: they need to be able to make their own decisions about every aspect of their lives, including their sexuality and sexual behaviour.
tgt_text: va fanele va kota ku titekela swiboho swa vona hi mayelana na xiyenge xihi kumbe xihi xa vutomi bya vona, ku katsa swa masangu na matikhomelo ya vona eka swa masangu.

src_text: ultimately, we will achieve the end of aids through the empowerment of young people, women and other people at risk.
tgt_text: emakumu, hi ta fikelela ku herisiwa ka aids hi ku nyika vanhu lavantshwa, vamanana na vanhu van’wana lava nga le ka nxungeto matimba.

src_text: this includes empowerment through access to information, advice and support.
tgt_text: leswi swi katsa ku nyika matimba hi ku tirhisa mﬁ kelelo eka mahungu, switsundzuxo na nseketelo.

src_text: it includes access to education and economic opportunities, especially for young women.
tgt_text: leswi swi katsa mﬁ kelelo eka swivandlanene swa dyondzo na swa ikhonomi, ngopfungopfu vamanana lavantshwa.

src_text: empowerment also means that every person must have access to testing, treatment and other health services.
tgt_text: ku nyika matimba swi tlhela swi vula leswaku munhu un’wana na un’wana u fanele a va na mfikelelo wo kamberiwa, vutshunguri na vukorhokeri bya swa rihanyu byin’wana.

src_text: the people of south africa have come so far, endured so much and made such great progress in the fight against hiv , aids and tuberculosis.
tgt_text: vanhu va le afrikadzonga va vuya kule swinene, va tiyisele swinene, naswona va ve na ku humelela eka ku lwisana na hiv , aids na rifuva.

src_text: let us intensify both our resolve and our actions to confront and overcome aids once and for all.
tgt_text: afrikadzonga yi hlula hiv na aids vukuzenzele unnamed loko hi ya emahlweni na matshalatshala ya hina yo lawula ntungu wa xitsongwatsongwana xa khorona lowu onhaka swinene, a hi nge papalati mintlhontlho ya swa rihannyu ra vaaki yin’wana leyi tiko ra hina ri kongomanaka na yona.

src_text: a better 2021 for all south africans the first weeks of the year have been difficult for all south africans.
tgt_text: 2021 yo antswa eka maafrikadzonga hinkwavomavhiki lamo sungula ya lembe a ma tika eka maafrikadzonga hinkwavo.

src_text: vukuzenzele unnamed the coronavirus pandemic has gotten worse, with new infections increasing far faster and far higher than before.
tgt_text: vukuzenzele unnamed ntungukulu wa khoronavhayirasi wu nyanyile, ku ri na mitluletavuvabyi leyintshwa leyi tlakukaka hi ku hatlisa swinene naswona yi ri ehenhla swinene kutlula leswi a swi ri xiswona eka nkarhi lowu nga hundza.

src_text: hospitals have been under great strain as more people have needed medical attention.
tgt_text: swibedhlele swi le hansi ka ntshikelelo lowukulukumba tanihileswi vanhu vo tala va dingaka vutshunguri.

src_text: while most economic sectors have been able to operate again for several months, it will take some time for the economy to recover and for lost jobs to be restored.
tgt_text: loko tisekitara tinyingi ti kotile ku tirha nakambe eka tin'hweti to talanyana.

src_text: as the new year starts, many families are still feeling the effects of the pandemic on their lives and livelihoods.
tgt_text: swi ta teka nkarhi eka ikhonomi ku hlakarhela na le ka mitirho leyi lahlekeke ku va yi tlhela yi kumeka hi vuntshwa.

src_text: the world is now entering the second year of the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt_text: tanihiloko lembe ra ha sungula, mindyangu yo tala ya ha twa switandzhaku swa ntungukulu lowu eka vutomi na vutihanyisi bya yona.

src_text: for south africa, as for most countries around the world, the year 2021 will be extremely challenging.
tgt_text: sweswi misava yi le ku ngheneni eka lembe ra vumbirhi ra ntunguku lowu wa khoronavhayirasi.

src_text: the second wave of covid19 infections may well be followed by further waves, which will threaten both the health of our people and the recovery of our economy.
tgt_text: eka afrikadzonga, tanihi le ka matiko manyingi emisaveni hinkwayo, lembe ra 2021 ri ta tlhontlha kutlula mpimo.

src_text: difficult as this year will be, i am certain that we will overcome the pandemic and set our country firmly on the path to recovery.
tgt_text: gandlati lera vumbirhi ra mitluletavuvabyi ya covid19 ri nga ha landzeriwa hi magandlati man'wana, leswi swi nga ta xungeta havumbirhi bya rihanyu ra vanhu va ka hina na nhlakarhelo wa ikhonomi.

src_text: my confidence comes from the south african people.
tgt_text: swi ri karhi swi tika tanihileswi lembe ri nga ta va xiswona, ndza tiyisa leswaku hi ta wu hlula ntungukulu lowu kutani hi veka tiko ra ka hina hi ndlela yo tiya eka ndlela ya nhlakarhelo.

src_text: if i look at how south africans responded to this crisis from the moment the virus arrived on our shores, i have no doubt that we have the resilience, discipline and ability to defeat this disease.
tgt_text: vutitshembi bya mina byi huma eka vanhu va afrikadzonga.

src_text: certainly there were exceptions, but the vast majority of south africans understood the need for restrictions on their movement and activities, and complied with the regulations that we had to put in place.
tgt_text: loko ndzi languta hilaha maafrikadzonga va anguleke hakona eka nkitsinkitsi lowu kusukela hi xikandyana lexi xitsongwa tsongwana lexi xi fikeke haxona etibuweni ta ka hina, a ndzi na ku kanakana leswaku hi na nkondzelelo, vutikhomi na vuswikoti bya ku hlula vuvabyi lebyi.

src_text: even more important than compliance, most south africans took responsibility for themselves and for others, following advice on issues like social distancing, wearing a mask and hand washing.
tgt_text: hakunene a ku ri na leswi pfumeleriweke, kambe vunyingi lebyikulu bya maafrikadzonga byi twisise xidingo xa swipimelo eka mfambafambo na migingiriko ya vona, naswona byi landzelele swinawana leswi hi bohekeke ku swi veka.

src_text: and where we fell short, we have, sadly, seen the consequences.
tgt_text: hambi ku ri swa nkoka swinene kutlula ku landzelela, maafrikadzonga vanyingi va byarhe vutihlamuleri bya vona vini na bya van'wana, va landzelela switsundzuxo eka timhaka to fana na ku siya mfphuka exikarhi vanhu, va ambala xipfalaxikandza na ku hlamba swandla.

src_text: we now know about the risks of closed spaces and crowded gatherings, of not wearing masks and not keeping our distance from others.
tgt_text: naswona laha hi kayiveleke kona, hi ndlela yo khomisa tingana, hi vonile switandzhaku.

src_text: this bodes well for the year ahead.
tgt_text: sweswi ha tiva hi mayelana na mixungeto ya tindhawu leti pfalekeke na tinhlengeletano leti nga tala vanhu, hi ku nga ambali swipfalaxikandza na ku nga siyi mpfhuka kusuka eka van'wana.

src_text: we now know much more about the disease and how to prevent its spread.
tgt_text: leswi swi hlola leswinene elembeni leswa ha taka.

src_text: and despite what one could call ‘pandemic fatigue’, we are no less determined as south africans to do what needs to be done.
tgt_text: sweswi hi tiva swo tala swinene hi mayelana na vuvabyi lebyi na hilaha ku siveriwaka hakona ku hangalaka ka byona.

src_text: as we adhere even more rigorously to the basic prevention measures, we will also be rolling out a mass vaccination campaign.
tgt_text: naswona hambileswi ku nga na leswi munhu a nga swi vulaka 'nkarhalo wa ntungukulu' a hi tiyimiselangi switsongo tanihi maafrikadzonga ku endla leswi swi dingaka ku endliwa.

src_text: as more and more people are vaccinated, we will both save lives and progressively reduce the risk of infection across the population.
tgt_text: tanihiloko hi landzelela hambi hi ndlela ya vurhonwana swinene magoza yo sivela ya masungulo, hi ta tlhela hi simeka pfhumba ra nsawutiso wa xintshungu.

src_text: getting enough vaccines as quickly as possible – and making sure that they reach the people who need them – will be one of the biggest tasks of the year.
tgt_text: tanihiloko vanhu vo tala va ri karhi va sawutisiwa, havumbirhi hi ta ponisa vutomi na ku hunguta hi ndlela leyi yaka emahlweni nxungeto wa mitluletavuvabyi eka vanhu va rixaka hinkwavo.

src_text: this will be particularly challenging as every country in the world is clamouring to secure a limited supply of vaccines.
tgt_text: ku kuma swisawutisi swo enela hi ku hatlisa hilaha swi kotekaka hakona na ku tiyisisa leswaku swi fikelela vanhu lava va swi dingaka swi ta va xin'wana xa swintirhwana leswikulukumba swa lembe.

src_text: but we are hard at work with partners in business, labour and civil society to make this happen.
tgt_text: leswi swi ta va swi tlhontlha swinene tanihileswi tiko rin'wana na rin'wana emisaveni ri lavaka ku kuma mphakelo lowu pimiweke wa swisawutisi.

src_text: we are working on several fronts to get vaccines, including through the global covax facility, the african union initiative and through our own engagements with vaccine manufacturers.
tgt_text: kambe hi le ku tirheni hi matimba na vatirhisani eka mabindzu, vatirhi na vaaki lava nga na ku tsakela kun'we ku endla leswi swi humelela.

src_text: as we act together to overcome the pandemic, we will need to work together to rebuild and transform our economy.
tgt_text: hi le ku tirheni eka matlhelo yo tlala ku kuma swisawutisi, ku katsa na hi ku tirhisa xitirhisiwa xa covax xa misava hinkwayo, pfhumba ra yuniyoni ya afrika na hi ku tirhisa mivulavurisano ya hina vini na vamaki va swisawutisi.

src_text: we have both the ability and the will to stimulate economic activity, grow our economy and create jobs.
tgt_text: loko hi tirhisana ku hlula ntungukulo lowu, hi ta dinga ku tirhisana ku aka hi vuntshwa na ku hundzuluxa ikhonomi ya hina.

src_text: and to do so in the midst of a pandemic.
tgt_text: hi na havumbirhi bya vuswikoti na hiseko ku hlohlotela nghingiriko wa ikhonomi, ku kurisa ikhonomi ya hina na ku tumbuluxa mitirho.

src_text: public finances are under extreme strain, now even more so because of the cost of our health response to covid19 and the social and economic relief measures we put in place to assist businesses and poor households.
tgt_text: na ku endla tano exikarhi ka ntungukulu.

src_text: the contraction of the economy also meant that tax revenue has declined significantly.
tgt_text: timali ta mfumo ti le hansi ka ntshikelelo lowukulu, sweswi swi nyanyisiwa hikwalaho ka ndhurho wa angulo wa hina wa swa rihanyu eka covid19 na magoza ya mphalalo wa vanhu na ikhonomi lama hi ma vekeke ku pfuneta mabindzu na miti leyi nga swela.

src_text: there are some parts of the economy that will take longer to recover due to lower global demand generally and restrictions on international travel.
tgt_text: nkhanyano wa ikhonomi wu tlhela wu vula leswaku mali ya xibalo yi ehlile hi ndlela yo tivikana.

src_text: that is why we need to be innovative and focused in our plans to rebuild the economy.
tgt_text: ku na swiphemu swin'wana swa ikhonomi leswi swi nga ta teka nkarhi wo leha swinene ku hlakarhela hikwalaho ka xikoxo xa misava hinkwavo xa le hansi hi ku angarhela na swipimelo eka tendzo ta matiko ya misava.

src_text: significantly, the economic reconstruction and recovery plan that we announced in october last year is based on broad consensus among all social part ners on the actions needed to rebuild the economy.
tgt_text: leswi hi swona swi endlaka hi dinga ku va na maendlelo mantshwa na ku kongomisa eka makungu ya hina ya ku aka ikhonomi hi vuntshwa.

src_text: this lays a firm basis for effective cooperation that draws on the resources, capabilities and energies of all sections of society.
tgt_text: hi ndlela yo tivikana, kungu ro aka hi vuntshwa na nhlakarhelo wa ikhonomi leri hi ri tiviseke hi nhlangula n'wexemu ri simekiwile eka ntwanano wo angarhela exikarhi ka vatirhisani va vaaki eka magoza lama dingiwaka ku aka hi vuntswha ikhonomi leyi.

src_text: we are seeing this in various practical ways.
tgt_text: leswi swi vumba masungulo yo tiya ya ntirhisano lowu tirhaka kahle lowu wu tswongaka eka swipfuno, vuswikoti na matimba kusuka eka swiyenge hinkwaswo swa rixaka.

src_text: for example, we have been working closely with private funders and multilateral development institutions to prepare infrastructure projects in areas like transport, human settlements, water and telecommunications.
tgt_text: hi le ku voneni ka leswi hi tindlela leti endlekaka to hambanahambana.

src_text: using the infrastructure fund as one of the vehicles, we are developing funding models for these projects that draw on several sources in both the public and private sectors.
tgt_text: tanihi xikombiso, hi vile hi ri eku tirhisaneni na vanyikatimali lava nga riki va mfumo na mihlangano ya nhluvukiso ya matikonyingi ku lulamisa tiphurojeke ta swimakiwakulu eka swiyenge swo fana na vutleketli, vutshamiso bya vanhu, mati na vuhlanganisi bya swa tiqingho.

src_text: this is particularly important at a time when public finances are limited.
tgt_text: hi ku tirhisa nkwama wa swimakiwakulu tanihi yin'wana ya tindlela leti, hi le ku hluvukiseni ka timodlolo to nyika timali ta tiphurojeke leti ti tswongaka eka swihlovo swo hlayanyana eka havumbirhi bya tisekitara ta mfumo na leti nga riki ta mfumo.

src_text: the presidential employment stimulus is another example of partnership in action.
tgt_text: leswi i swa nkonka swinene hi nkarhi lowu timali ta mfumo ti nga tsongahala.

src_text: understanding that it will take time for economic growth to translate into private sector employment, we have launched the employment stimulus to start creat ing work opportunities now.
tgt_text: xihlohloteri xa mitirho xa le hofisini ya phuresidente i xikombiso xin'wana xa xinakulobye lexi nga eku tirheni.

src_text: this programme is being coordinated from the presiden cy, but is being implemented by a range of government departments and different spheres.
tgt_text: ku twisisa leswaku swi ta teka nkarhi leswaku ku kula ka ikhonomi ku hundzuka mitirho ya sekitara leyi nga riki ya mfumo, hi simekile xihlohloteri xa mitirho ku sungula ku tumbuluxa swivandlanene swa mitirho sweswi.

src_text: through this programme, tens of thousands of unemployed people are able to both earn and learn as they provide valuable social services.
tgt_text: nongoloko lowu wu le ku tirhisanisiweni kusuka eka hofisini ya phuresidente, kambe ku le ku simekiweni hi tindzawulo ta mfumo to hambanahambana na swiyenge swo hambanahambana.

src_text: in time, this programme will include a ‘social employment’ part, where we will partner with other social actors to employ people in a variety of activities – from improving food security, to tackling genderbased violence to upgrading informal settlements – that all contribute to the common good.
tgt_text: hi ku tirhisa nongoloko lowu, vakhume va migidi va vanhu lava nga tirhiki va kota havumbirhi bya ku hola na ku dyondza tanihileswi wu nyikaka vukorhokeri bya swa vanhu bya nkoka.

src_text: all this work is being reinforced by an aggressive focus on those economic reforms that will have the greatest focus on growth.
tgt_text: hi nkarhi, nongoloko lowu wu ta katsa xiphemu xa 'ku thoriwa ka vanhu', laha hi nga ta tirhisana na vatekaxiave xa vanhu ku thola vanhu eka migingiriko yo hambanahambana kusuka eka nsirhelelo wa swakudya, kufika eka ku tirhana na madzolonga yo ya hi rimbewu ku antswisa vutshamiso lebyi nga riki bya ximfumo leyi yi hoxaka xandla eka ku vuyerisa vanhu hinkwavo.

src_text: these include the expansion of electricity generation capacity, making our ports more efficient and competitive, improving access to affordable broadband, and improving turnaround times for water, mining and other licenses.
tgt_text: ntirho lowu hinkwawo wu le ku tiyisisiweni hi nkongomo wa vurhena eka miantswiso liya ya ikhonomi leyi yi nga va na nkongomo lowukulukumba eka ku kula.

src_text: these efforts are being coordinated and monitored jointly by my office and national treasury.
tgt_text: leswi swi katsa ndlandlamukiso wa vuswikoti byo endla gezi, ku endla tinhlaluko ta hina ti tirha hi ku hatlisa na ku va leti phikizanaka, ku antswisa mfikelelo wa netiweke yo chipa, na ku antswisa mikarhi yo heta ku phurosesa tilayisense ta swa mati, ta swa vucelamigodi na tin'wana.

src_text: there is much to be done in the year ahead.
tgt_text: matshalatshala lama ma le ku tirhisanisiweni na ku vekiwa tihlo hi hofisi ya mina na vutamelankwama bya rixaka.

src_text: and we should be in no doubt that we will have to confront many daunting challenges.
tgt_text: ku na swo tala leswi faneleke ku endliwa elembeni leswa ha taka.

src_text: but we have shown that, as a nation, we are able to succeed when we work together in pursuit of a common purpose.
tgt_text: naswona a hi fanelangi ku kanakana leswaku hi ta boheka ku jamelana na mitlhontlho leyo tika yo tala.

src_text: if we remember that, and if we put our unity into action, we will ensure that 2021 brings better health and better lives to all our people.
tgt_text: kambe hi kombisile leswaku, tanihi rixaka, ha swi kota ku humelela loko hi tirhisana eka ku hlongorisa xikongomelo xo fana.

src_text: i wish you all the best for the new year.
tgt_text: 2021 yo antswa eka maafrikadzonga hinkwavomavhiki lamo sungula ya lembe a ma tika eka maafrikadzonga hinkwavo.

src_text: an honour to lead the african union vukuzenzele unnamed south africa’s term as chair of the african union has come to an end.
tgt_text: i nxiximo ku rhangela nhlangano wa matiko ya afrika (au) vukuzenzele unnamed theme ya afrikadzonga tanihi mutshamaxitulu wa nhlangano wa matiko ya afrika yi fikile emakumu.

src_text: as we reflect on our year in this position, i am reminded of the old saying that ‘in crisis lies opportunity’.
tgt_text: loko hi karhi hi la nguta eka lembe ra hina eka xiyimo lexi, ndzi tsundzu xiwa hi xivulavulelo xa khale lexi nge ‘laha ku nga na ku tika ku na ku humelela’.

src_text: ours was a baptism of fire, having assumed the chairship in the same month the first case of coronavirus was reported on the continent.
tgt_text: xa hina a ku ri ku khuvu riwa hi ndzilo, ku va hi su ngurile vutshamaxitulu eka n'hweti leyi fanaka leyi ku nga mangariwa mhangu ya khoronavhayirasi yo su ngula etikwenikulu.

src_text: the priorities we outlined for our term, among them furthering peace and security, the economic empowerment of women and deepening economic integration, had to be immediately and dramatically reoriented to deal with the pandemic.
tgt_text: leswi rhangaka hi nga swi longoloxela theme ya hina, exikarhi ka swona ku nga na ku yisa emahlweni kurhula na vusirhelelo, ku nyika vavasati matimba ya ikonomi na ku entisa nghenelelano wa ikhonomi, a swi fanele ku cinca nkongomo hi xihatla na hi laha ku kulu ku tirhana na ntungukulu.

src_text: our most pressing task was to steer the focus of the african union to addressing the worst global emergency in over a century.
tgt_text: xintirhwana xa hina xa nkoka a ku ri ku kongomisa ngongomo eka nhlangano wa matiko ya afrika eka ku tirhana na xilamulela mhangu xa misava xo nya nya eka dzana ra malembe lama nga hundza.

src_text: covid19 has affected all the countries on the continent.
tgt_text: covid19 yi khumbhile matiko hinkwawo eka tikokulu.

src_text: to date there are more than 3.5 million confirmed cases in africa, and more than 88,000 people have died.
tgt_text: ku fika namuntlha ku na kutlula kwalomu ka 3.5 wa timiliyoni wa timhangu leti tiyisisiweke eafrika, naswona kutlula kwalomu ka 88,000 wa vanhu va lovile.

src_text: it has been a health, humanitarian, social and economic crisis for african countries, most of whom are inadequately resourced to manage a health emergency of this size.
tgt_text: ku vile nkayakayo wa matiko ya afrika wa rihanyu, tintswalo eka vanhu, vanhu na ikhonomi, mo tala ma wona a ma na swipfuno leswi ringaneleke ku lawula xilamulelamhangu xa rihanyu xa sayizi yo tani.

src_text: and yet, as unprecedented as the nature of the pandemic has been, so too has been the manner in which african countries have come together to fight it.
tgt_text: loko swi ri tano, tanihi muxaka lowu wu nga si tsha maka wu va kona wa ntu ngukulu, na hi ndlela leyi matiko ya afrika ma nga si tshamaka ma hlangana ku wu lwisa.

src_text: in doing so we have drawn principally on the continent’s own expertise, capabilities and institutions such as the africa centres for disease control and prevention (africa cdc).
tgt_text: hi ku endla tano hi langutisa ngopfu eka vuswikoti bya tikokulu hi byoxe, vu swikoti na mihlangano yo fana na tisenthara ta afrika to lawula no sivela mavabyi (afrika cdc).

src_text: africa did not sit by passively as the true extent and danger of the pandemic unfurled.
tgt_text: afrika a yi nga tshamangi ntsena yi nga endli nchumu loko vukulu na nghozi ya ntungukulu swi humelela.

src_text: from the earliest days of the pandemic and led by the au, we swiftly developed a continental response strategy, driven by the africa cdc and regional task forces.
tgt_text: kusuka eka masiku yo sungula ya ntungukulu na hi ku rhangeriwa hi au, hi humelerisile kungu ro angula ra tikokulu, leri fambisiweke hi afrika cdc na valawuri va xifundzatsongo va xinti rhwana.

src_text: we realised that every country on the continent would be severely affected by the pandemic.
tgt_text: hi lemukile leswaku tiko rin'wana na rin'wana eka tikokulu ritava ri khumbiwile swinene hi ntungukulu.

src_text: most would not have the resources needed to meet the public health challenge or to protect their economies.
tgt_text: motala mangava ma nga ri na swipfuno leswi dingekaka ku fikelela xiphiqo xa rihanyu ra vanhu kumbe ku sirhelela tiikhonomi ta vona.

src_text: we therefore agreed as african countries to appoint several prominent africans as special envoys, who would engage with international funders and multilateral institutions to make the case for financial support and debt relief on africa’s behalf.
tgt_text: kutani hi pfumelelanini tanihi matiko ya afrika ku thola maafrika ma nkoka tanihi vayimeri vo hlawuleka, lava a va ta burisana na vapfuni hi timali va matiko mambe na mihla ngano ya mpfumelelano wa matiko ku endla mhangu ya nseketelo wa mali na mphalalo wa xikweleti hi ku yimela afrika.

src_text: in this way, working as a one continent, we were able to achieve debt relief for many countries and financial assistance towards our covid response and economic recovery.
tgt_text: hi ndlela leyi, ku tirha tanihi tikokulu rin'we, hi kotile ku fikelela mphalalo wa xikweleti wa matiko yo tala na mfuno wa timali eka angu lo wa hina eka covid19 na nhlakarhelo wa ikhonomi.

src_text: but much as african countries went to the international community for support, we first helped ourselves – establishing and capitalising a continental covid19 response fund.
tgt_text: kambe swotala tanihi ma tiko ya afrika ya yile eka mu ganga wa matiko mambe ku kuma nseketelo, hi sungurile hi tipfuna – hi humelerisa na ku nyika tikokulu mphalalo wa angulo wa covid19.

src_text: for every partnership forged with betterresourced nations and the international donor community, we set up our own innovative and groundbreaking african medical supplies platform to enable all african countries to quickly secure personal protective equipment and other medical supplies in an equitable, affordable manner.
tgt_text: eka xinakulobye xin'wana na xin'wana lexi hi xi endleke na tinxaka na muganga wo nyikela wa matiko mambe, hi ti endlerile pulatifomo ya swiphakeriwa swa rihanyu swa afrika swo sungula swa hina ku pfumelela matiko ya afrika leswaku ma hatla ma kuma switirhisiwa swo ti sirhelela hi wexe hi ku hatlisa na hi ndlela yo ringana na ku xaveka.

src_text: and now that the covid19 vaccine is available, we have worked as a collective to ensure that the continent gets its fair share, working with the covax facility and led by our own african vaccine acquisition task team.
tgt_text: naswona sweswi xisawutisi xa covid19 xi nga kona, hi tirhile tanihi nhlanganelo ku tiyisisa leswaku tikokulu ri kuma xiphemu xa rona lexi xi ri faneleke, hi ku tirha na cov ax facility na ku rha ngeriwa hi xipano xa xinti rhwana xo kuma xisawutisi xa afrika xa hina.

src_text: vaccine rollout has already commenced on the continent and we aspire to have the majority of the continent’s population vaccinated by the end of 2021 to achieve herd immunity.
tgt_text: mphakelo wa xisawutisi wu sungurile etikwenikulu naswona hi navela ku va vu nyingi bya vanhu va tikokulu va sawutisiwile hi ku hela ka 2021 ku fikelela nsawuto wa xintshungu.

src_text: we have acted as one to protect health, people and livelihoods on the continent.
tgt_text: hi tirhile tanihi lava va si rhelelaka rihanyu, vanhu na vutihanyisi eka tikokulu.

src_text: in doing so, we have demonstrated our capacity for selfreliance and our ability to be the drivers of our own development.
tgt_text: hi ku endla tano, hi kombisile vuswikoti bya hina bya ku tivuyisela na vuswikoti bya hina byo va vachayeri va nhluvuko wa hina.

src_text: despite the dominance of covid19, we have still managed to make advances in several of our key priorities.
tgt_text: handle ka kuva covid19 yi va na matimba, hi tlhele hi swikota ku endla ku antswa eka leswi swi rhangaka emahlweni swa nkoka eka hina swo hlaya.

src_text: during our term, the africa continental free trade area (afcfta) was finally launched, heralding a new era of intraafrican trade and economic integration.
tgt_text: hi nkarhi wa theme ya hina, ndhawu ya mabindzu ya nkaswipimelo ya tikokulu ra afrika (afcfta) yi hetelele yi simekiwile, ku komba ku cinca ka nkarhi wuntshwa wa nghenelelano wa ikhonomi na mabindzu exikarhi ka matiko ya afrika.

src_text: even under the difficult conditions posed by the pandemic, the continent has pushed ahead with towards the goal of ‘silencing the guns’ on the continent.
tgt_text: (na loko ku ri ehansi ka swiyimo swo tika leswi tisiweke hi ntungukulu, tikokulu ri susumetile ku ya emahlweni na ku kongoma eka xikongomelo xa ‘ku mi yeta swibamu’ eka tikokulu.

src_text: the au has been actively involved in negotiations around the grand ethiopian renaissance dam, in achieving a ceasefire in libya and promoting peace in south sudan.
tgt_text: au yi tshame yi nghenelerile eka mikanerisano eka grand ethiopian renai ssance dam, eka ku fikelela ntwanano wo herisa nyimpi elibya na ku hlohlotela ku rhula esouth sudan.

src_text: another focus of our term has been on the economic empowerment of women, which we will continue to champion even beyond our term and throughout the decade of african women’s financial and economic inclusion to 2030. as we hand over the baton to the democratic republic of congo (drc) we leave this preeminent continental body in a position of greater strength.
tgt_text: nkongomo wun'wana eka theme ya hina wu vile eka ku nyika matimba ya ikhonomi eka vavasati, leswi hi nga ta ya emahlweni hi swi hlohlotela ku hundza eka theme ya hina na kuya ku yile eka khume ra malembe ya nkatso wa timali na ikhonomi wa vavasati va afrika ku ya eka 2030. tanihi loko hi nyiketa nho nga ya vufambisi eka de mocratic republic of congo (drc) hi siya nhlangano wo antswa swinene wa tikokulu eka xivandla xa matimba swinene.

src_text: south africa will continue to play its part to foster integration on the continent, and support the incoming chair and the organisation in its efforts to meet the aspirations of the au’s agenda 2063. when the organisation for african unity was founded in 1963, member states planted the seeds of cooperation and solidarity in pursuit of a better life for all the peoples of africa.
tgt_text: afrikadzonga ri ta ya emahlweni ri tlanga xiphemu xa rona ku tiyisisa nghenelelano eka tikokulu, na nseke telo wa mutshamaxitulu loyi a nghenaka na nhlangano eka matimba ma wona ku fikelela ku navela ku fikelela ka aje nda ya au hi 2063. loko nhlangano wa ntwanano wa afrika wu si mekiwile hi 1963, matiko lama ma nga swirho eka nhlangano wa matiko mambe ma byarile mbewu ya nti rhisano na nseketelano hi ku lava vutomi byo antswa bya vanhu hinkwavo va afrika.

src_text: they affirmed that african unity was paramount if the welfare and wellbeing of africa’s people was to be assured.
tgt_text: ma tiyisisile leswaku ntwa nano wa afrika a wu ri na nkoka loko nhlayiseko na ntshamiseko wa vanhu va afrika a wu ta tshembisa.

src_text: history bears witness that these seeds have not always fallen on fertile ground, and over the years the continental unity project has experienced many hurdles and false starts.
tgt_text: matimu ya byarhe mbhoni ya leswaku timbewu leti a ti tshamanga ti kha ti wela eka misava yo nona, naswona eka malembe lamo tala phurojeke ya ntwanano wa tiko kulu yi tokotile ku tikeriwa na masungulo yo ka ya nga ri wona.

src_text: but the grave threat posed by this pandemic has galvanised african countries to collective action.
tgt_text: kambe nxungeto lowukulu wu nga tisiwa hi ntungukulu lowu wu tshukisile matiko ya afrika ku teka goza ra nhlanganelo.

src_text: in the hothouse of the covid19 crisis, the seeds of unity and cooperation planted by our pioneering forebears have come to life and flourished.
tgt_text: eka dyondzo ya xiyimo xa le henhla ya nkayakayo wa covid19, timbewu ta ntwanano na ntirhisano leti byariweke hi vakokwana wa va kokwana wa hina lava va hi rhangeleke ti mirile na swona ta tsakisa.

src_text: this time of great trial and difficulty has been among the au’s finest hours.
tgt_text: nkarhi lowu wa ndzingeto wa matimba na ku tika loku ku nga va kona exikarhi ka tiawara ta kahle ta au.

src_text: we are honoured to have been given the opportunity to lead the organisation through this period, when it practically demonstrated the true meaning of the words african union.
tgt_text: hi xiximiwile ku va hi nyikiwile nkarhi wo rhangela nhlangano eka nkarhi lowu, loko swi kombisile kahle nhlamuselo ya marito ya nhlangano wa matiko ya afrika.

src_text: this is an accomplishment for which all the citizens of our continent africa should feel proud and from which they should draw encouragement.
tgt_text: i nxiximo ku rhangela nhlangano wa matiko ya afrika (au) vukuzenzele unnamed theme ya afrikadzonga tanihi mutshamaxitulu wa nhlangano wa matiko ya afrika yi fikile emakumu.

src_text: steps to revive the economy vukuzenzele unnamed it will soon be a year since the first reported case of coronavirus disease (covid19) in our country.
tgt_text: magoza yo pfuxeta ikhonomi vukuzenzele unnamed ku nga ri khale ku ta va lembe kusukela loko ku vile na mhangu leyi tivisiweke yo sungula ya khoronavhayirasi etikweni ra ka hina.

src_text: the pandemic has come at a great cost to both public health and the livelihoods of millions of our people.
tgt_text: ntungukulu lowu wu tikisile swinene eka havumbirhi bya rihanyu ra vaaki na vutihanyisi bya timiliyoni ta vanhu va ka hina.

src_text: many workers lost part of their income as their work hours were reduced with many being retrenched.
tgt_text: vatirhi vo tala va lahlekeriwile hi xiphemu xa muholo wa vona tanihiloko tiawara ta vona ta ntirho ti hungutiwile na vo tala va hungutiwile emitirhweni.

src_text: several businesses have incurred heavy losses from scaledback operations.
tgt_text: mabindzu yo talanyana ya lahlekeriwile swinene hi kwalaho ka ku hungutiwa ka matirhelo.

src_text: others have had to close.
tgt_text: man'wana a ma boheka ku pfala.

src_text: people working in the informal sector have also suffered.
tgt_text: vanhu lava tirhaka eka sekitara yo ka yi nga ri ya ximfumo na vona va hluphekile.

src_text: most difficult of all, the pandemic has claimed the lives of breadwinners in many families, leaving them destitute and fearful for the future.
tgt_text: xo tika kutlula hinkwa swo, ntungukulu lowu wu koxile vutomi bya vahlayisi eka mindyangu yo tala, wu va siya va swelekile na ku chavela nkarhi lowu wa ha taka.

src_text: this is why the extensive relief measures we put in place were both necessary and urgent.
tgt_text: leswi hi swona swi endla ka leswaku magoza ya mpha lalo yo engeteleriwa ya ve kiwile hikuva a swi fanerile na ku va swa xihatla.

src_text: and, now that nearly a year has passed, we can say that these measures have proved effective.
tgt_text: na swona, sweswi nkarhi wa ku ya kwalomu ka lembe wu hundzile, hi nga vula leswaku magoza lama ma tikombile ku tirha kahle.

src_text: of the full package of relief measures that we introduced, perhaps the two measures that had the greatest impact were the special covid19 social relief of distress grant and the unemployment insurance fund's (uif) covid19 temporary employer/employee relief scheme, generally known as covid ters.
tgt_text: eka milongo hinkwayo ya magoza ya mphalalo lama hi nga ma tivisa, kumbexana magoza lamaya mambirhi lamaya ma nga va na nkhu mbo lowukulu a ku ri mudende wa covid19 wo hlawuleka na xikimi xa mphalalo wa muthori/muthoriwa xa nkarhinyana xa covid19 xa uif, lexi hi ntolovelo xi tivekaka tanihi covid ters.

src_text: we would not have been able to roll out these measures in such a short space of time if we had not had an extensive social security infrastructure already in place.
tgt_text: a hi ta va hi nga kotangi ku simeka magoza lama hi nkarhi lowo koma loko a hi nga vangi na switirhisiwakulu swa mali ya nhlayi so swo angarhela leswi se swi nga kona.

src_text: we were able to respond to this huge and immediate need in our society thanks to the substantial nationwide infrastructure and systems of the south african social security agency and the uif.
tgt_text: hi kotile ku angula eka xidingo lexikulukumba na ku va xa xihatla eka rixaka ra ka hina hikwalaho ka switirhisiwakulu swa tiko hinkwaro swo tivikana na tisisiteme ta ejensi ya mali ya nhlayiso wa vanhu ya afrikadzonga (sassa) na ndzindzakhombo wa lava nga tirhiki (uif).

src_text: there were certainly technical and other glitches along the way, but most of these were speedily resolved.
tgt_text: hakunene a ku ri na swikanganyisi swa xithekiniki na swin'wana swikanga nyisi kwala ku fambeni, kambe swo tala swa swona swi lulamisiwile hi ku ha tlisa.

src_text: these government agencies did outstanding work to enroll millions of new beneficiaries and ensure they were paid.
tgt_text: tiejensi leta mfumo ti endlile ntirho wo saseka swinene ku tsarisa vavuyeriwa vantshwa va timiliyoni na ku tiyisisa leswaku va hakeriwile.

src_text: the support provided by the uif was a lifeline to struggling businesses and employees.
tgt_text: nseketelo lowu nyikiweke hi uif a wu nyika vutomi eka mabindzu na vatirhi lava a va ri eku tikeriweni.

src_text: it made the difference between companies remaining open and being forced to close, between jobs saved and jobs lost.
tgt_text: wu endle ku cinca exikarhi ka tikhamphani leti nga sala ti pfurile na leti ti nga boheka ku pfala, exikarhi ka mitirho leyi nga ponisiwa na mitirho leyi nga lahleka.

src_text: this benefited businesses like sihle’s brew, a restaurant in gauteng, which was able to retain its 18 employees because of the ters scheme.
tgt_text: leswi swi vuyisele mabindzu yo fana na sihle’s brew, khefi ya swakudya swo dyela kwalaho egauteng, leyi yi nga kota ku vuyisela vatirhi va yona va 18 hikwalaho ka xikimi xa ters.

src_text: thanks to government support, mamoshal agae trading and projects, an autoelectrical business in mokopane, was able to pay its workers as well as its rent and rates during the lockdown.
tgt_text: hikwalaho ka nseketelo wa mfumo, mamosha lagae trading and projects, bindzu ra gezi ra timovha emokopane, ri kotile ku hakela vatirhi va rona ku katsa na mali ya rhente na tihakelo ta vukorhokeri bya masipala hi nkarhi wa mpfalelo.

src_text: employees in dire straits were able to receive a portion of their salaries.
tgt_text: vatirhi lava a va ri eka swiyimo swo tika va kotile ku amukela xiphemu xa miholo ya vona.

src_text: lindiwe ntuli, a paralegal in centurion, has told how receiving her benefits enabled her to work from home and be able to afford her rent.
tgt_text: lindiwe ntuli, munhu loyi a leteriweke switsongo eka swa nawu ecenturion, u rungurile hilaha ku kuma mivuyelo ya yena swi nga n’wi pfumelela hakona ku tirha a ri ekaya na ku kota ku fikelela rhente ya yena.

src_text: there are many stories of companies that have been able to stay afloat over the past year because of the support they received from the uif.
tgt_text: ku na switori swo tala swa tikhamphani leti ti nga kota ku tshama ta ha tirha ku ya emahlweni eka lembe leri nga hundza hikwalaho ka nseketelo lowu ti nga wu kuma kusuka eka uif.

src_text: the same can be said of the small businesses helped by the various grants and loans provided by a number of departments.
tgt_text: swo fana swi nga vuriwa hi mabindzu lamatsongo lama nga pfuniwa hi malimpfuneto yo hambanahambana na mali yo lomba leyi a yi nyikiwa hi tindzawulo to hlayanyana.

src_text: these measures greatly helped our people in their time of need.
tgt_text: magoza lawa ma pfunile swinene vanhu va ka hina hi nkarhi wa vona wa ku dinga.

src_text: as we transition from relief to recovery, we have to shift gear.
tgt_text: loko ha ha cinca kusuka eka mphalalo ku ya eka nhlakarhelo, hi fanele ku cinca maendlelo.

src_text: while these relief measures were designed to be temporary, the economy will continue to feel the effects of the pandemic for some time.
tgt_text: loko magoza lama mphalalo ma endleriwile ku va ma xinkadyana, ikhonomi yi ta ya emahlweni yi twa switandzhaku swa ntungukulu ku ringana nkarhi wo leha.

src_text: even as lockdown restrictions have been eased, many companies are struggling to cope with the fallout of months of diminished operations and lost revenue.
tgt_text: hambi tanihileswi swipimelo swa mpfalelo swi nga olovisiwa, tikhamphani to tala ti le ku tikeriweni ku kondzelela switandzhaku swo landzela swa tin'hweti ta matirhelo lama hungutiweke na ku lahlekeriwa hi malinhlengeleto.

src_text: it is for this reason that, following extensive discussion with social partners at the national economic development and labour council the covid ters benefit has been extended until 15 march 2021 for sectors that have not been able to fully operate.
tgt_text: swi hikwalaho ka xiva ngelo lexi leswaku, hi ku landza mikanerisano yo leha na vanakulobye va vaaki eka nedlac, mbuyelo wa covid ters wu engeteleriweke kufika hi siku ra 15 nyenyankulu 2021 eka tisekitara leti a ti nga koti ku tirha hi ku hetiseka.

src_text: the special covid grant has been extended for another three months.
tgt_text: malimpfuneto ya covid yo hlawuleka yi engeteleriwile kuya eka tin'hweti tinharhu.

src_text: these remain shortterm measures.
tgt_text: lama ku tshama ku ri magoza ya nkarhinyana.

src_text: our focus now must be on creating an enabling environment for businesses to recover, and for economic growth that spurs job creation and attracts invest ment.
tgt_text: nkongomo wa hina sweswi wu fanele wu va eka ku tumbuluxa mbangu lowu kotisaka mabindzu ku hlakarhela, na ku kula ka ikhonomi leyi yi nga xihlohloteri xa ku tumbuluxiwa ka mitirho na ku koka rinoko ra vuvekisi.

src_text: the recovery will be difficult and will take time, not least because we are still in the midst of the pandemic.
tgt_text: nhlakarhelo wu ta tika naswona wu ta teka nkarhi, kungari nkarhinyana hikuva ha ha ri exikarhi ka ntungukulu.

src_text: important as these relief measures are now, we will not be able to sustain them indefinitely.
tgt_text: xa nkoka tanihileswi magoza lama mphalalo lama ma xiswona sweswi, a hi nga swi koti ku ma yisa emahlweni ku ya ku yile.

src_text: we need to make sure that these relief measures provide a firm foundation for a broader recovery without driving the country deeper into debt.
tgt_text: hi fanele ku tiyisisa le swaku magoza lama mpha lalo ma nyika masungulo mo tiya ma nhlakarhelo wo anama handle ko ndzondzo meta tiko eswikweletini.

src_text: unless we can bring our national debt down to sustainable levels no meaningful economic recovery will be possible.
tgt_text: handle ka loko hi nga hu nguta xikweleti xa hina xa rixaka kufika eka tilevhele leti yisekaka emahlweni ku hava nhlakarhelo wo twala wa ikhonomi wu nga fikelelekaka.

src_text: our national consciousness must now move beyond the realm of relief into that of recovery, and we must all be part of this effort.
tgt_text: ku lemuka ka hina ka rixaka sweswi swi fanele ku suka eka xivandla xa mpha lalo ku ya eka xa nhlaka rhelo, naswona hinkwerhu hi fanele ku va xiphemu xa ku tikarhata loku.

src_text: as government, hard decisions on public spending will need to be made and implemented this year.
tgt_text: tanihi mfumo, swiboho swo tika hi matirhiselo ya mali ya mfumo swi ta dinga ku tekiwa na ku simekiwa lembe leri.

src_text: companies will need to be innovative in driving methods and processes that secure their sustainability and profitability, with job retention being their foremost consideration.
tgt_text: tikhamphani ti ta dinga ku va na maendlelo mantshwa eka ku fambisa tindlela na tiphurosese leti ti sirhelelaka vuyisekamahlweni na mpindzulo, na ku vuyi sela mitirho ku va leswi swi rhangaka emahlweni.

src_text: we must put our money back into our economy by buying local products, supporting local businesses and industrie and procuring from local suppliers.
tgt_text: hi fanele ku tlherisela mali ya hina eka ikhonomi ya hina hi ku xava swimakiwa swa laha tikweni, hi seketela mabindzu ya laha tikweni na tiindasitiri na ku xava eka vaphakeri va laha tikweni.

src_text: an injured patient with strong prospects for recovery is given regular phys ical therapy to help them get stronger until they can stand unaided.
tgt_text: muvabyi loyi a nga vaviseka a nga na ntshembo wa nhlakarhelo u nyikiwa therapi ya le mirini ya nkarhi na nkarhi ku n'wi pfuna ku tiya kukondza a kota ku yima hi yexe.

src_text: so must these temporary relief measures be seen as the means to get our economy back on its feet.
tgt_text: xana magoza lama ma mphalalo ma nkarhinyana ma nga voniwa tanihi ti ndlela to vuyisela ikhonomi ya hina yi yima nakambe.

src_text: our ultimate goal is to walk again.
tgt_text: xikongomelokulu xa hina i ku famba nakambe.

src_text: as a nation, let us all lend a hand.
tgt_text: tanihi rixaka, a hi hoxeni xandla hinkwerhu.

src_text: let us be part of our own development and progress.
tgt_text: a hi veni xiphemu xa nhluvuko na ndlandlamuko wa hina vini.

src_text: let us use the extended relief to drive a stronger recovery.
tgt_text: magoza yo pfuxeta ikhonomi vukuzenzele unnamed ku nga ri khale ku ta va lembe kusukela loko ku vile na mhangu leyi tivisiweke yo sungula ya khoronavhayirasi etikweni ra ka hina.

src_text: a professional public service vukuzenzele unnamed when i was elected to the position of president of south africa, i said that building an efficient, capable and ethical state free from corruption was among my foremost priorities.
tgt_text: vukorhokeri bya mfumo bya xiphurofexinali vukuzenzele unnamed loko ndzi hlawuriwa eka xiyimo xa ku va phuresidente wa afrikadzonga, ndzi vule leswaku ku aka mfumo lowu nga tlangisiki swi pfuno, wa vuswikoti na ku va wa matikhomelo nene lowu nga hava vu kungundzwana a ku ri xo rhanga emahlweni eka swirhangana swa mina.

src_text: only a capable, efficient, ethical and developmentoriented state can deliver on the commitment to improve the lives of the people of this country.
tgt_text: ko va ntsena mfumo wa vuswikoti, lowu nga tlangi siki swipfuno, wa matikho melonene na ku va wu lava nhluvukiso ntsena wu nga kotaka ku humelerisa eka ku tinyiketela ku antswi sa vutomi bya vanhu va tiko leri.

src_text: this means that the public service must be staffed by men and women who are professional, skilled, selfless and honest.
tgt_text: leswi swi vula leswaku vukorhokeri bya mfumo byi boheka ku va na vatirhi va vavanuna na vavasati lava va nga tiphurofexinali, lava nga na swikili, lava nga tilaveriki swa vona vini na ku va lava nga tshembeka.

src_text: they must be committed to upholding the values of the constitution, and must, as i said in my inaugural speech, "faithfully serve no other cause than that of the public".
tgt_text: va boheka ku va va tinyike tela ku tiyisisa mikhuvanene ya vumbiwa, naswona va bo heka, tanihiloko ndzi vurile eka mbulavulo wa ku vekiwa exitulwini, "va korhokela hi ku tshembeka xivangelo xa vaaki ntsena handle ka swin'wana".

src_text: over the past two weeks, public consultations have been underway on an important policy document that will give greater impetus to our efforts to bolster, strengthen and capacitate the civil service.
tgt_text: eka mavhiki mambirhi lama nga hundza, mikanerisano ya vaaki a yi ri ku endlekeni eka dokhumente ya pholisi ya nkoka leyi yi nga ta nyika mafulufulu lamakulu eka matshalatshala ya hina ya ku seketela, ku tiyisa na ku nyika vuswikoti eka vuko rhokeri bya mfumo.

src_text: the draft national implementation framework towards the professionalisation of the public service aims to build a state that better serves our people, that is insulated from undue political interference and where appointments are made on merit.
tgt_text: rimba ra nsimeko ra rixaka ra mpfapfarhuto eka ku endla vukorhokeri bya mfumo byi va bya xiphurofexinali ri na xikongomelo xa ku aka mfumo lowu korhokelaka vanhu va ka hina ku antswa, lowu wu sirheleriweke eka ku nghenelela ka tipolitiki loku nga fanelangiki na laha ku thoriwa swi endliwaka hi ku ya hi mipimo yo ringanela.

src_text: the framework was approved by cabinet in november last year and structured consultation with various sectors of society are now underway.
tgt_text: rimba leri ri pasisiwile hi khabinete hi hukuri lembe leri nga hela naswona mika nerisano ya xivumbeko na ti sekitara to hambanahambana ta vaaki yi le ku endliweni sweswi.

src_text: twentyseven years into democracy, it can be said of the public service that while several pockets of excellence exist, we have serious challenges in many government departments with regards to skills, competence and professionalism.
tgt_text: makumembirhinkombo wa malembe eka xidemo kirasi, swi nga vuriwa hi vukorhokeri bya mfumo leswaku loko swikhwama swo hlayanyana swa kahle swinene swi ri kona, hi na mitlhontlho yo tivikana eka tindzawulo ta mfumo to tala hi mayelana na swikili, vuswikoti, na moya wa xi phurofexinali.

src_text: all too often, people have been hired into and promoted to key positions for which they are neither suitable nor qualified.
tgt_text: hinkwaswo hi ntolovelo kutlula mpimo, vanhu va thoriwile na ku tlakusiwa ku ya eka swiyimo leswi swi nga fanelangiki kumbe va nga swi thwaselangiki.

src_text: this affects government performance, but also contributes to nepotism, political interference in the work of departments, lack of accountability, mismanagement and corruption.
tgt_text: leswi swi khumba matirhelo ya mfumo, kambe swi tlhela swi hoxa xandla eka ku tholana hi vuxaka, ku nghenelela ka tipolitiki eka ntirho wa tindzawulo, ku pfumaleka ka vutihlamuleri, vufambisi byo ka byi nga lulamangi na vukungundzwana.

src_text: there is also the related problem of political and executive interference in the administration of the public service.
tgt_text: ku tlhela ku va na xiphiqo xo fambelana xa ku nghe nelela ka tipolitiki na vurha ngerinkulu eka mafambiselo ya vukorhokeri bya mfumo.

src_text: one need only to look at the instability in government departments when senior managers are swopped or replaced each time a new minister is appointed.
tgt_text: munhu u dinga ntsena ku languta eka ku pfumaleka ntshamiseko eka tindzawulo ta mfumo loko vafambisi nkulu va cincacinciwa kumbe ku siviwa nkarhi na nkarhi loko ku thoriwa holobye lontshwa.

src_text: directorsgeneral (dgs) and provincial heads of departments (hods) are particularly affected.
tgt_text: valawurinkulu vo angarhe la na tinhloko ta tindzawulo ta swifundzakulu hi vona va khumbekaka ngopfungopfu.

src_text: in some departments, dgs, hods and executive managers have had stability of tenure, enabling the departments to function with little disruption.
tgt_text: eka tindzawulo tin'wana, tidg, tihod na vafambisi va vurhangerinkulu va vile na ntshamiseko eka nkarhi wa vona wa ku khoma hofisi, leswi pfumelelaka tindzawu lo ku tirha hi nkavanyeto wuntsongo.

src_text: in most of these departments where there is leadership stability, audit outcomes tend to be positive and public funds can be accounted for.
tgt_text: eka vunyingi bya tindzawulo leti laha ku nga na ntshamiseko wa vu rhangeri, mivuyelo ya oditi yi tala ku va leyinene naswona timali ta mfumo ti humese riwa vutihlamuleri.

src_text: where there is a high turnover of heads of department, there is often administrative turmoil.
tgt_text: laha ku nga na nhlayo ya le henhla ya ku fambetela na ku siviwa ka tinhloko ta tindzawulo, ku tala ku tshama ku ri na nkavanyeto wa mafambiselo.

src_text: one of the key recommendations made in the draft framework is that the public service must be depoliticised and that government departments must be insulated from politics.
tgt_text: xin'we xa swibumabumelo swa nkoka leswi endliweke eka rimba ra mpfapfarhuto hi leswaku vukorhokeri bya mfumo, ngopfungopfu eka swiyimo swa le henhla byi boheka ku nga tirhiseriwi tipolitiki na leswaku tindza wulo ta mfumo ti boheka ku sirheleriwa eka tipolitiki.

src_text: professionalisation is necessary for stability in the public service, especially in the senior ranks.
tgt_text: ku endliwa ka xiphu rofexinali swi fanerile ku endlela ntshamiseko eka vukorhokeri bya mfumo, ngopfungopfu eka swiyimo swa le henhla.

src_text: public servants must be able to continue doing their jobs "regardless of any changes of ministers, members of the executive council or councillors within the governing party in charge of the administration, or changes to political parties after elections".
tgt_text: vatirhela mfumo va boheka ku ya emahlweni va tirha mitirho ya vona "handle ka micinco yihi kumbe yihi ya vaholo bye, swirho swa khansele ya vurhangerinkulu kumbe vakhanselara endzeni ka vandla leri fumaka leri ri nga na matimba ya mafambiselo, kumbe ku cinca ka mavandla ya tipolitiki endzhaku ka mihlawulo".

src_text: we are proposing a number of farreaching reforms, such as extending the tenure of hods based on merit and performance, doing occupationbased competency assessments and involving the public service commission in the interviews of dgs and deputy dgs.
tgt_text: hi le ku ringanyeteni ka mi antswiso yo hlayanyana, tani hi ku engetelela nkarhi wa ku khoma hofisi wa tinhloko ta ndzawulo hi ku ya hi mpimo wo ringanela na matirhelo, ku endla mihlahluvo ya vu swikoti bya ntirho na ku katsa khomixini ya vuko rhokeri bya mfumo eka tii nthavhiyu ta valawurinkulu vo angarhela na swandla swa valawurinkulu vo angarhela.

src_text: introducing integrity tests for all shortlisted individuals will help so that we can recruit civil servants who can serve honestly.
tgt_text: ku tivisa swikambelo swa vutengi eka vanhu lava hlawuriweke swi ta pfuna leswaku hi kota ku kuma vatirhelamfumo lava nga ta korhokela hi ku tshembe ka.

src_text: we also need to extend the compulsory entrance exams that we introduced in april 2020 beyond senior management.
tgt_text: hi tlhela hi dinga ku ndlandlamuxa swikambelo swo nghena swo boha leswi hi nga swi tivisa hi dziva misoko 2020 ku hundza eka vufambisi bya le henhla.

src_text: successful developmental states have similar measures which help advance professionalism within the public service.
tgt_text: mifumo leyi hluvukaka leyi nga humelela yi na ma goza lama fanaka lama nga ta pfuna ku antswisa moya wa xiphurofexinali endzeni ka vukorhokeri bya mfumo.

src_text: as we note in the draft framework, "the bureaucracy must continue to loyally and diligently implement the political mandate set by voters and the party, but to refrain from being political actors themselves.
tgt_text: loko ha ha tsala eka rimba ra mpfapfarhuto, "xibyu rokirasi xi boheka ku ya emahlweni ku simeka hi ku tshembeka na hi vurhonwana xilerisoximfumo xa tipolitiki lexi nga vekiwa.

src_text: "we are suggesting a more rigorous approach towards recruitment and selection of public servants, induction and performance management.
tgt_text: hi ringanyeta endlelo ra vurhon'wana swinene eka ku laviwa na ku hlawuriwa ka vatirhelamfumo, vutivisi bya matirhelo na malawulelo ya matirhelo.

src_text: this includes continuous learning and a clear professional development path for every public servant.
tgt_text: leswi swi katsa ku dyondza loku yaka ema hlweni na ndlela ya nhluvu kiso wa xiphurofexinali yo vonaka ya mutirhelamfumo un'wana na un'wana.

src_text: the draft framework puts emphasis on the need to hold public servants accountable for irregularities, to do away with a culture of impunity in the mismanagement and misappropriation of state resources.
tgt_text: rimba ra mpfapfarhuto ri veka ntshikelelo eka xidingo xa ku endla vatirhelamfumo va va na vutihlamuleri eka matirhiselo ya mali lama hambanaka na milawu, ku tshika ntolovelo wa ku ka va nga katsiwi eka mixupulo eka malawulelo yo homboloka na ku yiveteriwa ka swipfuno swa mfumo.

src_text: professionalising the public service involves training for accounting officers across all spheres of government on the applicable legislative provisions.
tgt_text: ku endla vukorhokeri bya mfumo byi va bya xiphu rofexinali swi katsa vuleteri bya vaofisiri lava nga na vu tihlamuleri eka swiyenge hinkwaswo swa mfumo eka milulamiselo ya milawu leyi nyikiweke leyi faneleke.

src_text: the national school of government (nsg) has a vital role to play in this regard.
tgt_text: xikolo xa mfumo xa rixaka xi na xiave xa nkoka ku xi tlanga eka mhaka leyi.

src_text: professionalism is not only about having the right qualifications and technical skills, but also about having appropriate standards of respect, courtesy and integrity in dealing with members of the public.
tgt_text: moya wa xiphurofexinali a wu hi mayelana na ku va na mithwaso leyi faneleke na swikili swa xithekiniki ntsena, kambe wu tlhela wu va hi mayelana na ku va na mipimo leyi faneleke ya nhlonipho, ku titsongahata na vutengi eka ku tirhana na vaaki.

src_text: the public service is diverse, with a huge range of skills, qualifications and capabilities.
tgt_text: vukorhokeri bya mfumo byi hambananile, byi ri na vunavi lebyikulu bya swikili, mi thwaso na vuswikoti.

src_text: many public servants have specialised skills that are necessary for the effective provision of services.
tgt_text: vatirhelamfumo vo tala va na swikili swo kongomisa leswi swi faneleke eka ku phakela loku tirhaka kahle ka vukorhokeri.

src_text: it is therefore not necessarily the case that we need a smaller public service: what we actually need is a fitforpurpose public service with suitable skills, a professional ethic and a commitment to serving the people.
tgt_text: hikokwalaho, a hi mhaka ngopfu ya leswaku hi dinga vukorhokeri bya mfumo lebyitsongo: lexi hi xi dingaka ngopfu i vukorho keri bya mfumo lebyi ringa neleke xikongomelo lebyi nga na swikili leswi ringaneleke, matikhomelonene ma xiphu rofexinali na ku tinyiketela ku korhokela vanhu.

src_text: the men and women of the public service need to be capacitated to play their role in driving development and consolidating democracy.
tgt_text: vavanuna na vavasati va vukorhokeri bya mfumo va dinga ku nyikiwa vuswikoti ku kota ku tlanga xiphemu xa vona eka ku fambisa nhluvukiso na ku tiyisa xi demokirasi.

src_text: this is our best guarantee of a capable state that serves the interests of citizens.
tgt_text: lexi i xitiyisiso xa hina xo tlula hinkwaswo xa mfumo wo swi kota lowu korhokelaka ku tsakela ka vaakatiko.

src_text: i call on you to be part of the public consultation process around this draft framework, which is available on the nsg's website, and to make your voice heard.
tgt_text: ndzi mi kombela ku va xiphemu xa phurosese ya mikanerisano ya vaaki hi mayelana na rimba ra mpfa pfarhuto, leri ri kumekaka eka webusayiti ya xikolo xa mfumo xa rixaka, na ku endla leswaku rito ra wena ri twiwa.

src_text: the public service does not belong to any one party, nor should it be the domain of any particular interest group.
tgt_text: vukorhokeri bya mfumo a hi bya vandla rin'we ro karhi, kumbe a byi fanelangi ku va ndhawu ya ntlawa wo karhi lowu nga na ku navela.

src_text: it should not be a law unto itself.
tgt_text: a byi fanelangi byi va nawu eka byona n'wini.

src_text: the public service belongs to the people of south africa.
tgt_text: vukorhokeri bya mfumo i bya vanhu va afrikadzonga.

src_text: it must serve them and them alone.
tgt_text: vukorhokeri bya mfumo bya xiphurofexinali vukuzenzele unnamed loko ndzi hlawuriwa eka xiyimo xa ku va phuresidente wa afrikadzonga, ndzi vule leswaku ku aka mfumo lowu nga tlangisiki swi pfuno, wa vuswikoti na ku va wa matikhomelo nene lowu nga hava vu kungundzwana a ku ri xo rhanga emahlweni eka swirhangana swa mina.

src_text: traditional leaders key to recovery efforts vukuzenzele unnamed in the last few months, we have had to bid a sad farewell to two of our country’s most respected traditional monarchs.
tgt_text: varhangeri va swa ndhavuko i va nkoka eka matshalatshala yo pfuxeta hi vuntshwa vukuzenzele unnamed eka tin’hweti titso ngo leti hundzeke, hi vile ni ku lelana ka gome na tihosi timbirhi to hlonipheka swinene ta tiko ra hina.

src_text: the zulu people recently laid to rest his majesty king goodwill zwelithini ka bhekuzulu who reigned for half a century.
tgt_text: sweswinyana rixaka ra ma zulu ri lahlile muhlonipheki hosi goodwill zwelithini ka bhekuzulu loyi a fumeke ku ringana hafu ya dzana ra ma lembe.

src_text: in january, the bapedi people buried kgoshikgolo thulare thulare iii, who passed away less than a year after his inauguration.
tgt_text: hi sunguti, vapedi va lahlile kgoshikgolo thulare thulare iii, loyi a nga hundza emisaveni ehansi ka lembe a vekiwile exitulwini.

src_text: with their passing, we have lost champions of the preservation of our heritage, and revered custodians of the histories of their respective peoples.
tgt_text: eka ku hundza ka vona emisaveni, hi lahlekeriwile hi tinhenha leti ti hlayiseke ndhavuko, na vanhu vo hloniphiwa hikwalaho ka matimu yo hlonipheka ya rixaka ra vona.

src_text: at the same time, they were vital players in rural development, and were committed to driving programmes to uplift the material conditions of their people.
tgt_text: nakambe, a va ri vatlangi va xiphemu xa nkoka eka nhluvukiso wa miganga, naswona a va tinyiketerile ku fambisa minongonoko ku tlakusa swiyimo swa nkoka swa rixaka ra vona.

src_text: with the advent of democracy in 1994, it was a priority of the new government to restore the integrity and legitimacy of traditional leadership in line with indigenous law and customs and subject to the constitution of the republic.
tgt_text: loko ku sungula xidemoki rasi hi 1994, a ku ri xirhanga na xa mfumo lowuntshwa ku vuyisela vutshembeki na ntiyiso wa vurhangeri bya swa ndhavuko hi ku fa mbelana na milawu ya ndha vuko na mahanyelo na hiku landzelela vumbiwa ra ri phabuliki.

src_text: the institution of traditional leadership continues to play an important role in the lives of millions of people around our country, especially in rural areas.
tgt_text: huvo ya vurhangeri bya swa ndhavuko yi ya ema hlweni yi va na ntirho wa nkoka evuton’wini bya ti miliyoni ya vanhu etikweni ra ka hina, ngopfungopfu ematikoxikaya.

src_text: traditional leaders support and drive development in their communities.
tgt_text: varhangeri va swa ndhavuko va seke tela na ku fambisa nhluvuko emigangeni ya vona.

src_text: recently, i had the opportunity to participate in the debate on the opening of the national house of traditional leaders, which was concerned with the most pressing issues currently facing the country.
