tgt_text: ku fika emakumu ka xiyimo xa mhangu swi le kusuhi eafrikadzonga vukuzenzele unnamed presidente cyril ramaphosa wa ha ku tivisa eka mbulavulo wa yena wa xiyimo xa rixaka (sona) leswaku mfumo wu kunguhata ku herisa xiyimo xa mhangu xa rixaka tanihiloko tiko ri ri karhi ri nghena eka xiyimo lexintshwa eka malawulelo ya ntungu wa vuvabyi bya khoronavhayirasi (covid19).

src_text: special tribunal is showing that crime does not pay vukuzenzele unnamed during the recent presidential imbizo in mahikeng, several citizens raised concerns about the pace of the fight against corruption.
tgt_text: huvo yo tengisa yo hlawuleka yi kombisa leswaku vugevenga a byi hakeli allison cooper hi nkarhi wa imbizo ya presidente leya haku vaka kona emahikeng, vaakatiko vo hlaya va boxe swivilelo mayelana ni rivilo ro lwisana ni vukungundzwana.

src_text: they told me what i have heard in many other communities across the country: that the perpetrators of such acts are known, not least because they flaunt the proceeds of their crimes.
tgt_text: va ndzi byele leswi ndzi swi tweke emigangeni yin’wana yotala etikweni hinkwaro: leswaku vatluri va nawu va swendlo swo tano va tiveka, ngopfu hikuva va bombisa rifuwo leri kumiweke hi vugevenga bya vona.

src_text: but the arm of the law is long.
tgt_text: kambe voko ra nawu ri lehile.

src_text: those who have stolen from the state may believe they have gotten away with it.
tgt_text: lava yiveleke mfumo va nga tshemba leswaku a va nga vi ni vutihlamuleri.

src_text: but their deeds will eventually catch up with them, whoever they are, and whatever position they may hold.
tgt_text: kambe ekuheteleleni mitirho ya vona yi ta humela erivaleni, un’wana ni un’wana laha a nga kona, ni le ka xiyimo xihi ni xihi lexi va nga na xona.

src_text: they will learn that crime does not pay.
tgt_text: va ta dyondza leswaku vugevenga a byi hakeli.

src_text: in this regard, one of our most effective weapons in the fight against corruption and state capture is the special tribunal of the special investigating unit (siu), which i established in 2019. it adjudicates on matters that the siu institutes for civil litigation after it has concluded its investigations.
tgt_text: hi mayelana na leswi, yin’wana ya tindlela ta hina to lwisana ni vukungunzwana hi ku hetiseka ni ku vutliwa ka matimba ya mfumo i huvo yo tengisa yo hlawuleka ya yuniti yo hlawuleka ya vulavisisi bya swa vugevenga (siu), leyi ndzi nga yi simeka hi 2019. yi avanyisa eka milandzu leyi vekiweke hi siu eka vuchuchisi bya nawu eka vaaki endzhaku ko fikisa vulavisisi emakumu.

src_text: the special tribunal was set up to speed up litigation.
tgt_text: huvo yo tengisa yo hlawuleka yi simekiwile leswaku yi hatlisisa ku tengisa.

src_text: this approach has made it possible for public funds and state assets lost to corrupt acts to be recovered faster, avoiding delays in the high courts, where the siu has to wait its turn together with other litigants.
tgt_text: maendlelo lawa ma endle leswaku timali ta mfumo na nhundzu ya mfumo leswi a swi lahlekile hikwalaho ka migingiriko ya vukungundzwana swi kota ku kumeka hi xihatla, ku papalata ku hlwela eka tikhoto ta le henhla, laha siu yi faneleke ku yimela nkarhi wa yona xikan’we ni vatengisi kulobye.

src_text: the siu can request preservation orders and the freezing of assets to prevent further losses to the state.
tgt_text: siu yi nga kombela swileriso swo hlawuleka ni ku yimisa ku tirhisiwa ka nhundzu ku sivela ku lahlekeriwa ka mfumo ku ya emahlweni.

src_text: this is important when considering that per petrators who are under suspicion often go to great lengths to move around, hide or dispose of proceeds of corruption.
tgt_text: leswi swi ni nkoka loko hi tekela enhlokweni leswaku vatluri va nawu lava ehleketeriwaka va ringeta hi tindlela hinkwato ku fambafambisa, ku tumbeta kumbe ku susa rifuwo leri va ri kumeke hi vukungundzwana.

src_text: there can be no doubt the special tribunal has been a game changer.
tgt_text: a hi kanakani leswaku huvo yo tengisa yo hlawuleka yi tisile ku cinca lokukulu.

src_text: since its establishment, the tribunal has recovered around r8.6 billion from unlawful contracts.
tgt_text: ku sukela loko yi simekiwile, huvo yo tengisa yi kote ku tlhela yi kuma kwalomu ka r8.6 wa tibiliyoni eka tikontiraka leti a ti nyikiwile swi nga ri enawini.

src_text: for any fight against corruption to be deemed effective, it is not sufficient that perpetrators are pro secuted.
tgt_text: ku va nyimpi yihi ni yihi yo lwisana ni vukungundzwana yi ta vuriwa leswaku ya tirha, a swi ringananga loko vatluri va nawu va tengisiwa.

src_text: the proceeds of their crimes must be recovered.
tgt_text: rifuwo leri va ri kumeke hi vugevenga bya vona ri fanele ku tlheriseriwa endzhaku.

src_text: this money belongs to citizens and should be used to meet their needs.
tgt_text: mali leyi i ya vaakatiko naswona yi fanele ku tirhisiwa ku fikelela swilaveko swa vona.

src_text: the special tribunal recently ordered two construction companies to return the profits they earned from r40 million in contracts to erect the beit bridge border fence.
tgt_text: huvo yo tengisa yo hlawuleka ya ha ku lerisa tikhamphani timbirhi to aka ku tlherisa mitswalo leyi va yi kumeke kusuka eka r40 wa timiliyoni ya tikontiraka to vamba darata endzila kanini wa beit bridge.

src_text: this followed an investigation by the siu that uncovered a number of irregularities, including a prepayment to the companies by the department of public works and infrastructure.
tgt_text: leswi swi landza ndzavisiso wa siu lowu nga kumisisa maendlelo yobiha mohlaya, ku katsa ni ku hakeriwa ka tikhamphani ti nga si tirha hi ndzawulo ya mitirho ya mfumo ni switirhisiwa nkulu.

src_text: over the past few weeks alone, the tribunal has reviewed and set aside more than r100 million worth of irregular and unlawful contracts arising from covidrelated pro curement.
tgt_text: eka mavhiki mangarimangani lama nga hundza ntsena, huvo yo tengisa yi kambisisile kutani yi veka etlhelo ku tlula kwalomu ka r100 wa timiliyoni ta maendlelo yo biha ni tikontiraka to ka ti nga ri enawini leswi sukaka eka makumelo ya tinhundzu lama fambelanaka na covid.

src_text: the special tribunal has also been successful in getting back money from senior executives in stateowned enterprises who conducted irregular business activities.
tgt_text: huvo yo tengisa yo hlawuleka yi tlhele yi humelela ku vuyisa mali kusuka eka varhangeri va le henhla va mabindzu ya mfumo lava fambiseke migingiriko ya mabindzu hi ndlela yo biha.

src_text: for example, last year a former transnet executive was ordered to pay r26 million he received as a shareholder of a firm of consulting engineers contracted to transnet while he was a fulltime employee.
tgt_text: xikombiso, lembe leri nga hundza murhangeri wa khale wa transnet u lerisiwile ku hakela r26 wa timiliyoni leyi a yi kumeke tanihi loyi a nga ni nkavelo eka bindzu ra feme ya vainjhiniyere vo tsundzuxa lava endleke kontiraka na transnet loko yena a ri mutirhi wa nkarhi hinkwawo.

src_text: the siu has in a number of cases approached the tribunal to delay the payment of pension benefits, pending the outcome of its investigations, to public servants implicated in financial irregularities or fruitless and wasteful expenditure.
tgt_text: eka milandzu yo hlaya siu yi burisanile ni huvo yo tengisa ku hlwerisa ku hakela mivuyelo ya phenxeni, loko ka ha yimeriwe mbuyelo wa milavisiso ya yona, eka vatirhela mfumo lava hehliweke hi maendlelo mo biha ma swa timali kumbe matirhiselo mo ka ma nga vuyerisi ni vusompfa.

src_text: the cases before the special tribunal show that much work still needs to be done to strengthen governance and management across all arms of the state.
tgt_text: milandzu leyi nga eka huvo yo tengisa yo hlawuleka yi kombisa leswaku ntirho wotala wa ha fanele ku endliwa ku tiyisa vulawuri ni vufambisi eka swiyenge swa mfumo hinkwaswo.

src_text: they point to serious lapses on the part of accounting officers and failures to adhere to laws and regulations governing procurement i have said before that winning the war on cor ruption will be difficult, and that it will take time to unravel the vast webs of patronage that had become entrenched.
tgt_text: va kombisa ku tsandzeka lokukulu ka vaofisiri lava nga ni vutihlamuleri ni ku hluleka ku landzelela milawu ni swiletelo leswi fambisaka makumelo ya tinhundzu.

src_text: i have also maintained that we must fight private sector corruption with equal vigour, because for every public sector employee willing to be bribed, there is a business person willing to pay a bribe.
tgt_text: ndzi boxile ekusunguleni leswaku ku hlula nyimpi yo lwisana ni vukungundzwa na swi ta tika, na leswaku swi ta teka nkarhi ku vhumbunula swisaka swo phasaphasana swa ku seketelana loku se ku nga ni timitsu.

src_text: these corrupt relationships have eroded the capacity of the state to deliver on its mandate.
tgt_text: ndzi tlhele ndzi tiyisisa leswaku hi fanele hi lwisana ni vukungundzwana bya mabindzu la ma ngariki ya mfumo hi matimba lama ringanaka, hikuva eka mutirhela mfumo un’wana ni un’wana loyi a tsakelaka ku xaviwa, ku ni n’wamabindzu loyi a tiyimiseleke ku ba mati tingwenya tietela.

src_text: they have set back the state’s efforts to provide decent healthcare, to deliver clean water, and to ensure a consistent supply of power to communities and businesses.
tgt_text: vunghana lebya vuku ngundzwana byi onhe vuswikoti bya mfumo byo humelerisa swikongomelo swa wona.

src_text: but, as the special tribunal has demonstrated, we are steadily turning the tide.
tgt_text: byi tlherisele endzhaku matshalatshala ya mfumo yo nyika nhlayiso wa rihanyu wa nkoka, ku nyika mati mo tenga, ni ku tiyisisa mphakelo wo tiya wa gezi eka vaaki ni mabindzu.

src_text: not only are perpetrators being arrested and taken to court; they are also having to forfeit the proceeds of their crimes.
tgt_text: kambe, tanihi loko huvo yo tengisa yo hlawuleka yi kombisile, hi le ku cinceni ka xiyimo hi katsongotsongo.

src_text: there is still a long way to go, and there is a huge amount of stolen public funds that still need to be recovered.
tgt_text: vatluri va milawu a va khomiwi ni ku yisiwa ekhoto ntsena; va tlhela va fanele ku lahlekeriwa hi rifuwo leri va ri kumeke hi vugevenga.

src_text: but the siu and the special tribunal have made a good start, and i am confident of many more successes in the months and years ahead.
tgt_text: huvo yo tengisa yo hlawuleka yi kombisa leswaku vugevenga a byi hakeli allison cooper hi nkarhi wa imbizo ya presidente leya haku vaka kona emahikeng, vaakatiko vo hlaya va boxe swivilelo mayelana ni rivilo ro lwisana ni vukungundzwana.

src_text: food at school ensures children don’t go hungry vukuzenzele unnamed over nine million children receive a nutritious meal at school thanks to government’s national school nutrition programme (nsnp), which was introduced in 1994. the programme aims to improve children’s ability to learn, by reducing malnutrition and hunger and improving school attendance, especially at disadvantaged schools.
tgt_text: nongonoko wa mphamelo wa swakudya wu tiyisisa leswaku vana va nga siki vukuzenzele unnamed kutlula kaye wa timiliyoni ta vana va kuma swakudya leswi akaka miri exikolweni hikwalaho ka nongonoko wa mphakelo wa swakudya wa xikolo (nsnp) wa mfumo, lowu tivisiweke hi 1994. nongonoko lowu wu kongomisa eka ku antswisa vuswikoti bya vana bya ku dyondza, hi ku hunguta mphamelo wa swakudya wa xiyimo xa le hansi na ndlala na ku antswisa matelo exikolweni, ngopfungopfu eswikolweni leswi sweleke.

src_text: "the programme is critical for furthering learners’ constitutional rights to basic nutrition and basic education," explains deputy minister of basic education dr reginah mhaule.
tgt_text: "nongonoko lowu wu na nkoka wa ku hetisisa timfanelo leti nga eka vumbiwa ta vana to kuma mphamelo wa swakudya leswi akaka miri na dyondzo ya masungulo," ku hlamusela xandla xa holobye wa dyondzo ya le hansi dkd reginah mhaule.

src_text: as a result of the nsnp, more children are attending school on time and more regularly, and their concentration in class has improved.
tgt_text: hikwalaho ka nsnp, vana vo tala va ya exikolweni hi nkarhi naswona mikarhi hinkwayo, naswona nkongomiso wa vona wa miehleketo etlilasini wu tlakukile.

src_text: according to the department of basic education (dbe), learners are taught good eating and lifestyle habits.
tgt_text: hi ku ya hi ndzawulo ya dyondzo ya le hansi (dbe), vadyondzi va dyondzisiwa mitolovelo ya madyelo ya kahle na mitolovelo ya mahanyelo.

src_text: schools are also encouraged to set up their own food gardens to supplement the nsnp menu.
tgt_text: swikolo swi tlhela swi hlohloteriwa ku endla swirhapa swa swona swa swakudya ku engetela menyu wa nsnp.

src_text: learners, teachers and parents are taught grow their own food.
tgt_text: vadyondzi, vadyondzisi na vatswari va dyondzisiwa ku rima swakudya swa vona.

src_text: nsnp awards thabang primary school in bethlehem, free state, is one of the schools that benefits from the nsnp.
tgt_text: masagwadi ya nsnp xikolo xa phurayimari xa thabang ebethlehem, free state, i xin’wana xa swikolo leswi vuyeriwaka kusuka eka nsnp.

src_text: the school recently won the nsnp best school award.
tgt_text: xikolo lexi sweswinyana xi winile sagwadi ra xikolo lexi tlulaka hinkwaswo ra nsnp.

src_text: the awards celebrate schools’ nutrition programmes by looking at their hygiene and safety practices, nutritious meals, food gardens and nutrition education.
tgt_text: masagwadi lama ya tlangela minongonoko ya mphamelo wa swakudya ya swikolo hi ku languta maendlelo ya swona ya nsivelamavabyi na ya vuhlayiseki, swakudya leswi akaka miri, swirhapa swa swakudya na dyondzo ya swakudya leswi akaka miri.

src_text: "i am extremely grateful that the school won the award," says seyanokeng sejake, the thabang pri mary principal for the past 24 years.
tgt_text: "ndzi khensa swinene ku va xikolo xi winile sagwadi leri," ku vula seyanokeng sejake, nhloko ya xikolo xa phurayimari xa thabang ku ringana 24 wa malembe lama nga hundza.

src_text: thabang primary school has been running its nutrition programme since 1994. today, it ensures that its 1 065 learners receive a healthy breakfast daily from a local business.
tgt_text: xikolo xa phurayimari xa thabang xi fambisile nongonoko wa xona wa swakudya kusukela hi 1994. namuntlha, xi tiyisisa leswaku vadyondzi va xona va 1 065 va kuma swakudya swa nimixo swa rihanyo siku na siku kusuka eka bindzu ra le mugangeni.

src_text: the food is cooked by unemployed members of the community, who are appointed by the school governing body (sgb).
tgt_text: swakudya leswi swi swekiwa hi vaaki va le mugangeni lava nga tirhiki, lava va thori weke hi huvo yo fuma xikolo (sgb).

src_text: "our six employed voluntary food handlers (vfh) make the food provided by the department of basic education through the allocation of funds to the school," says sejake.
tgt_text: "valawuri va hina va swaku dya vo tinyikela (vfh) lava thoriweke va tsevu va endla swakudya leswi tisiwaka hi ndzawulo ya dyondzo hi ku avela xikolo mali," ku vula sejake.

src_text: they vfhs each receive a stipend for preparing the food.
tgt_text: tivfh ha yin’we ti kuma hakelonyana yo va ti lulamisile swakudya.

src_text: thabang primary school took top honours at the awards due to the hard work and commitment of its sgb, management team and functional nsnp com mittee, says sejake.
tgt_text: xikolo xa phurayimari xa thabang xi kumile mixiximo ya le henhla eka masagwadi hikwalaho ka ku tirha hi matimba na ku tinyiketela ka sgb ya xona, xipano xa vufambisi na komiti ya nsnp leyi tirhaka, ku vula sejake.

src_text: "punctuality is the order of the day.
tgt_text: ku fika hi nkarhi i xilaveko xa siku.

src_text: we don’t allow absenteeism, without a valid reason, and we have no dropouts.
tgt_text: a hi pfumeleli ku xwa, ku nga ri na xivangelo xo twala, naswona a hi na vana lava tshikaka xikolo.

src_text: our learners’ concentration and general performance have also improved," she adds.
tgt_text: nkongomiso wa miehleketo wa vadyondzi va hina na matirhelo hi ku angarhela swi tlakukile," a engetela.

src_text: as the prize for winning the award is a stateoftheart kitchen built by the tiger brands foundation, the school’s nutrition programme is set to become even better.
tgt_text: tanihileswi risiva ra ku wina sagwadi leri ku nga ku akeriwa xitanga xa ximanguvalawa hi va ka tiger brands foundation, nongonoko wa mphamelo wa swakudya wa xikolo wu ta antswa swinene.

src_text: the school also ensures that there are enough food supplies which are managed properly, to ensure there is always food for the programme.
tgt_text: xikolo xi tlhela xi tiyisisa leswaku ku na mphakelo wa swakudya swo ringanela leswi lawuriwaka kahle, ku tiyisisa leswaku ku na swakudya swa nongonoko lowu.

src_text: "for example, we have a food garden that supplies vegetables to supplement the nsnp allocation," explains sejake.
tgt_text: "tanihi xikombiso, hi na xirhapa xa swakudya lexi xi phakelaka matsavu ku engetela avelo wa nsnp," ku hlamusela sejake.

src_text: award winners in the best schools category, grootdrink intermediate, in the mgcawu district in the northern cape, took second place and aaron gqedu primary school, in nelson mandela bay in the eastern cape, came third.
tgt_text: vawini va sagwadi eka nkhetekanyo wa swikolo leswi tlulaka hinkwaswo, grootdrink intermediate, eka xifundzatsongo xa mgcawu, ekapan’walungu, xi kumile xiyimo xa vumbirhi; na xikolo xa phurayimari xa aaron gqedu, enelson mandela bay, kapavuhumadyambu, xi kumile xiyimo xa vunharhu.

src_text: they will receive kitchen equipment from the depart ment of basic education.
tgt_text: swi ta kuma switirhisiwa swa le xitangeni kusuka eka ndzawulo ya dyondzo ya le hansi.

src_text: the best district award was won by umzinyathi (kwazulunatal).
tgt_text: sagwadi ra xifundzatsongo lexi tlulaka hinkwaswo ri winiwile hi umzinyathi (kwazulunatal).

src_text: in 2020/21, the nsnp provided meals to children at 21 189 schools.
tgt_text: nongonoko wa mphamelo wa swakudya wu tiyisisa leswaku vana va nga siki vukuzenzele unnamed kutlula kaye wa timiliyoni ta vana va kuma swakudya leswi akaka miri exikolweni hikwalaho ka nongonoko wa mphakelo wa swakudya wa xikolo (nsnp) wa mfumo, lowu tivisiweke hi 1994. nongonoko lowu wu kongomisa eka ku antswisa vuswikoti bya vana bya ku dyondza, hi ku hunguta mphamelo wa swakudya wa xiyimo xa le hansi na ndlala na ku antswisa matelo exikolweni, ngopfungopfu eswikolweni leswi sweleke.

src_text: keep children safe online vukuzenzele unnamed with the world increasingly moving online, it’s important for children to take advantage these opportunities while also staying safe.
tgt_text: endla vana va tshama va hlayisekile eka inthanete vukuzenzele unnamed loko misava yi ri karhi yi cincela eka inthanete, swi na nkoka leswaku vana va tirhisa swivandlanene leswi kambe va tlhela va tshama va hlayisekile.

src_text: the government communication and information system (gcis) and digify africa recently hosted a webinar with media monitoring africa (mma) and the film and publication board (fpb) to teach children, educators, parents and the public about how to be responsible online.
tgt_text: vufambisi bya mfumo bya vuhlanganisi na mahungu (gcis) na digify africa sweswinyana va rhurhele na webinari na media monitoring africa (mma) na bodo ya tifilimi na vukandziyisi (fpb) ku dyondzisa vana, vadyondzisi, vatswari na vaaki hi mayelana na hilaha u vaka na vutihlamuleri hakona eka inthanete.

src_text: phakamile khumalo, the programme manager of public and media skills development at mma, said seven out of 10 children who answered questions as part of the sa kids online study said they used the internet without their parents’ permission.
tgt_text: phakamile khumalo, mufambisi wa nongonoko wa nhluvukiso wa vaaki na swikili swa swihangalasamahungu eka mma, u te nkombo ehenhla ka 10 ra vana lava va hlamuleke swivutiso tanihi xiphemu xa ku teka xiave xa sa kids online study va te va tirhisa inthanete ku nga ri na mpfumelelo wa vatswari.

src_text: only four out of 10 children said they have some sort of information about online safety.
tgt_text: ko va mune ntsena ehenhla ka 10 ra vana lava va vuleke leswaku va na vuxokoxoko byo karhi hi mayelana na vuhlayiseki bya le ka inthanete.

src_text: this shows that children need skills and resources to help them use the internet safely.
tgt_text: leswi swi kombeta leswaku vana va lava vuswikoti na swipfuno ku va pfuna ku tirhisa inthanete hi ndlela leyi hlayisekeke.

src_text: mmaletjema poto, the fpb’s child protection officer, said parents need to be aware of the dangers their children face online, in cluding viewing child pornography or child sexual abuse, and being groomed by sexual predators.
tgt_text: mmaletjema poto, muofisiri wa nsirhelelo wa n’wana, u te vatswari va fanele ku lemuka makhombo lama vana va vona va hlanganaka na wona eka inthanete, ku katsa na ku vona swifaniso swa masangu kumbe nxaniso hi swa masangu wa vana, na ku kurisiwa hi vabvanyengeti va swa masangu.

src_text: children can become the target of online sexual predators by just conducting an innocent internet search and clicking on the wrong link.
tgt_text: vana va nga va hundzuriwa mpakani ya vabvanyengeti va swa masangu va le ka inthanete hi ku endla ntsena musecho wa le ka inthanete wo pfumala nandzu na ku tlilika tilinki to hoxeka.

src_text: offenders then gain their trust and start grooming them.
tgt_text: kutani vaonhi va kuma ntshembo wa vona na ku sungula ku va kurisa hi swa masangu.

src_text: "the child is often embarrassed and therefore doesn’t speak about it, which makes it hard for them to get out of the grooming cycle," said poto.
tgt_text: "n’wana hakanyingi wa nyuma naswona hikokwalaho a nga vulavuli hi mayelana na swona, leswi swi endlaka leswaku swi va tikela ku huma eka ndzhendzeleko wo kurisiwa hi swa masangu," ku vula poto.

src_text: she also warned against sharing videos or images of child pornography online.
tgt_text: u tlhele a tsundzuxa hi ku lwisana na ku hangalasa tivhidiyo kumbe swifaniso swa masangu swa vana eka inthanete.

src_text: "it has become a norm to share content on social media.
tgt_text: "swi hundzukile ntolovelo ku hangalasa vundzeni eka swihangalasamahungu.

src_text: but sharing this type of content is evidence of child abuse.
tgt_text: kambe ku hangalasa muxaka lowu wa vundzeni i vumbhoni bya ku xanisiwa ka vana.

src_text: being in possession of such content or sharing it is a criminal offence," added poto.
tgt_text: ku va u ri na vundzeni byo tano kumbe ku byi hangalasa i nandzu wa vugevenga," ku engetela poto.

src_text: help at hand there are various resources available to help children use the internet safely.
tgt_text: mpfuno lowu kumekaka ku na swipfuno swo hambanahambana leswi kumekaka ku pfuna vana ku tirhisa inthanete hi ndlela leyi hlayisekeke.

tgt_text: mma yi fambisa web rangers, phurogireme ya litheresi ya xidijitali ku tlakusa vuswikoti bya vadyondzi, vadyondzisi na vatswari.

src_text: flood relief for kzn and e cape allison cooper government will help residents of kwazulunatal and the eastern cape rebuild their lives and homes after floods recently left a trail of death and destruction in the two provinces.
tgt_text: mphalalo wa ndhambi ekzn ni le kapa vuxa allison cooper mfumo wu ta pfuna vaaki va le kwazulunatal ni le kapa vuxa ku pfuxelela vutomi ni makaya ya vona hi vuntshwa endzhaku ka tindhambi leti nga siya mafu mo landzelelana ni ku onha nhundzu ku nga ri khale eka swifundzankulu leswimbirhi.

src_text: president cyril ramaphosa said national treasury will make money available for relief efforts to help those affected by the floods.
tgt_text: presidente cyril ramaphosa u vule leswaku vutameri bya timali ta tiko byi ta endla leswaku ku va na mali ku endla matshalatshala yo phalala ku pfuna lava khumbekeke hi ndhambi.

src_text: "the minister of finance has said that r1 billion is immediately available," he said.
tgt_text: "holobye wa swa timali u vule leswaku r1 wa tibiliyoni yi kona hi xihatla."

src_text: president ramaphosa will also approach parliament for additional resources.
tgt_text: a vula tano.

src_text: government is working with the solidarity fund, private sector and nongovernmental and communitybased organisations to support victims.
tgt_text: presidente ramaphosa u ta tlhela a burisana ni palemente ku kuma switirhisiwa swo engetela.

src_text: the solidarity fund will set up a separate bank account for the flood disaster for south african and foreign donors to contribute to relief efforts.
tgt_text: mfumo wu tirhisana na nkwama wa vun’we, mabindzu mo ka ma nga ri ma mfumo ni mihlangano yo ka yi nga ri ya mfumo ni ya miganga ku seketela vatwisiwa ku vava.

src_text: government will also provide vouchers to help households rebuild partially damaged houses, the president said.
tgt_text: nkwama wa vun’we wu ta tumbuluxa akhawunti ya bangi ya le tlhelo ku langutana ni khombo ra ndhambi leswaku maafrikadzonga ni vanyikeri va matikomambe va nyikela eka matshalatshala yo phalala.

src_text: "a comprehensive assessment of the economic cost of these floods still has to be made, but it is clear that it will run into billions of rands for the rebuilding of infrastructure and loss of production."
tgt_text: mfumo wu ta tlhela wu nyika tivhochara ku pfuna mindyangu ku aka hi vuntshwa tindlu leti nga onhaka katsongo, ku vula presidente.

src_text: he added that the money set aside for the flood victims must reach those who need it the most.
tgt_text: ku kambela loku twisisekaka ka nkoxo wa ikhonomi ka tindhambi leti ka ha fanele ku endliwa, kambe swi le rivaleni leswaku swi ta tsutsuma kwalomu ka tibiliyoni ta tirhandi ku aka miako hi vuntshwa ni ku lahlekeriwa hi swikumiwa.

src_text: "it will be critical, as we undertake this work, that all the re sources we mobilise are used for their intended purposes and reach the intended recipients.
tgt_text: "u engetele hi ku vula leswaku mali leyi vekiweke etlhelo ya lava twisiweke ku vava hi ndhambi yi fanele ku fikelela lava yi dingaka swinene.

src_text: there can be no room for corruption, mismanagement or fraud of any sort," the president stressed.
tgt_text: "swi ta va ni nkoka, loko hi tirha ntirho lowu, leswaku switirhisiwa hinkwaswo leswi hi swi hlengeletaka swi tirhisiwa eka swikongomelo swa swona naswona swi fikelela lava faneleke ku swi amukela.

src_text: threephased response president ramaphosa said government will respond to the disaster in three phases.
tgt_text: a ku nga vi ni ndhawu ya vukungundzwana, ku tirhisa hi vusompfa kumbe vuxisi bya muxaka wihi kumbe wihi," ku tshikelela presidente.

src_text: it will first focus on immediate humanitarian relief, ensuring that everyone affected is safe and their basic needs are met.
tgt_text: swiphemu swinharhu swo hlamula presidente ramaphosa u boxe leswaku mfumo wu ta hlamula eka khombo hi ku tirhisa swiphemu swinharhu.

src_text: "second, we will focus on stabilisation and recovery, rehousing people who have lost homes and restoring the provision of services.
tgt_text: wu ta sungula hi ku langutisa eka mphalalo wa ximunhu, ku tiyisisa leswaku un’wana loyi a khumbekeke u hlayisekile naswona swilaveko swa vona swa nkoka swi fikeleriwile.

src_text: "third, we will focus on reconstruction and rebuilding," he said.
tgt_text: "xavumbirhi, hi ta langutisa eka ntshamiseko ni mpfuxelelo, ku rhurhela vanhu lava nga lahlekeriwa hi makaya ya vona ni ku tlherisela mphakelo wa vukorhokeri.

src_text: the reconstruction and building phase will include the construction of houses in suitable areas.
tgt_text: xavunharhu, hi ta langutisa eka ku aka hi vuntshwa," a vula tano.

src_text: the department of human settlements has already begun an assessment of damages to houses across the province.
tgt_text: xiphemu xo aka hi vutshwa ni ku aka xi ta katsa ku aka tindlu eka tindhawu leti nga ringanela.

src_text: "an immediate task is to house those people who have been displaced by the floods and preparations are underway to provide temporary residential units," said president ramaphosa.
tgt_text: ndzawulo ya vutshamiso bya vanhu se yi sungule ku kambela maonhakele ya tindlu eka xifundzankulu hinkwaxo.

src_text: the department of public works and infrastructure is identifying suitable state land that can be used for resettlement.
tgt_text: "ntirho wa xihatla i ku rhurhela vanhu lava nga rhurhisiwa hi tindhambi kutani malunghiselo ma le ndleleni ku nyika tindhawu ta vutshamo ta xinkadyana," ku vula presidente ramaphosa.

src_text: extensive damage the rains caused extensive damage to houses; businesses; roads and bridges; water, electricity, rail and telecommunications infrastructure.
tgt_text: ndzawulo ya mitirho ya mfumo na miako yi le ku languteni ka ndhawu ya mfumo leyi nga ringanela leyi nga tirhisiwaka ku rhurhisela vanhu.

src_text: schools, health facilities, police stations and magistrates’ courts were also affected, along with fuel and food supplies.
tgt_text: ku onhoka lokukulu timpfula ti vangile ku onhaka lokukulu eka tindlu; mabindzu; mapatu ni mabiloho; mati, gezi, swiporo ni switirhisiwa swa vuhlanganisi bya tiqingho.

src_text: "it is estimated that over 270 000 learners were affected and over 600 schools were damaged, 16 of which cannot be accessed due to damage to connecting roads and bridges.
tgt_text: swikolo, switirhisiwa swa rihanyu, switichi swa maphorisa ni tikhoto ta vamajisitarata na swona swi khumbekile, kun’we ni mafurha ni mpha kelo wa swakudya.

src_text: "sixtysix public healthcare facilities were affected, although there has been minimal disruption to health services in most affected districts," the president said.
tgt_text: "ku pimanyetiwe leswaku kwalomu ka ku tlula 270 000 wa vadyondzi va khumbekile kutani ku tlula 600 wa swikolo swi onhiwile, laha 16 swi nga fikelelekiki hiko kwalaho ka ku onhiwa ka mapatu ni mabiloho lama swi hlanganisaka.

src_text: extensive work is under way to restore basic services to various areas in kzn.
tgt_text: "makumetsevutsevu ya switirhisiwa swa mfumo swa rihanyu swi khumbekile, hambileswi ku nga ni nkavanyeto wutsongo wa vukorhokeri bya swa riha nyu eka swifundzatsongo swotala leswi khumbekeke, ku vula presidente.

src_text: more than 400 people have lost their lives in kzn and many people are missing.
tgt_text: ntirho lowukulu wu le ku endliweni ku vuyelerisa vukorhokeri bya nkoka eka tindhawu to hambanahambana ekzn.

src_text: one death has also been reported in the eastern cape.
tgt_text: ku tlula 400 wa vanhu va lahlekeriwe hi vutomi bya vona ekzn naswona vanhu votala va lahlekile.

src_text: over 4 000 homes have been destroyed and 8 300 have been partially damaged, leaving 40 000 people homeless.
tgt_text: nakambe rifu rin’we ri vikiwile kusuka ekapa vuxa.

src_text: the president said that the south african police service (saps) and the south african national defence force (sandf) have been leading search and rescue efforts.
tgt_text: ku tlula 4 000 wa makaya ya onhiwile kutani 8 300 ya onheke katsongo, swi siya vanhu va 40 000 va pfumala makaya.

src_text: this includes the deployment of saps personnel, diving teams, canine units and various vessels, helicopters and fixedwing planes to the most affected areas.
tgt_text: presidente u boxe leswaku vukorhokeri bya maphorisa ya afrikadzonga (saps) na vuthu ra vusirheleri ra rixaka ra afrikadzonga (sandf) a va ri karhi va rhangela ku lava ni matshalatshala yo ponisa.

src_text: "aircraft from the sandf have been used both for rescue and for the delivery of relief supplies – such as food, water, tents and blankets – to people in inaccessible areas.
tgt_text: leswi swi katsa ku rhumeriwa ka vatirhi va saps, swipanu swo hlambela, yuniti ya timbyana ta maphorisa na swikwewetsu swo hambanahambana, swihahampfhukaphatsa ni swihahampfhuka eka tindhawu to hlaya leti nga khumbeka.

src_text: "i have authorised the sandf to bring in more personnel, water storage and purification supplies and engineering teams to assist with electricity and water restoration," he said government departments at national and provincial levels; municipalities; nongovernmental organisations and businesses have been distributing basic relief materials such as food, blankets, mattresses, clothing, chronic medication, toiletries and cooking utensils.
tgt_text: "swihahampfhuka swo suka eka sandf swi tirhisiwile ku ponisa ni ku nyiketiwa ka switirhisiwa swo phalala – tanihi swakudya, mati, matende na mikumba – eka vanhu lava nga eka tindhawu leti nga fikelelekiki.

src_text: cabinet recently declared a national state of disaster in response to floods.
tgt_text: "ndzi nyike mpfumelelo wa sandf ku tisa vatirhi votala, swo hlayisela mati ni switirhisiwa swo tengisa mati ni swipanu swa vainjhiniyara ku pfuna hi ku pfuxeta gezi na mati," a vula tano.

src_text: the president described the floods as a humanitarian disaster that called for a "massive and urgent relief effort.
tgt_text: ku tlhandlekela, tindzawulo ta mfumo etikweni ni le ka swifundzankulu; timasipala; mihlangano yo ka yi nga ri ya mfumo ni mabindzu a va ri karhi va phakela swo phalala leswi lavekaka tanihi swakudya, mikumba, mibedo, swiambalo, mirhi yo lawula vuvabyi, switirhisiwa swo hlamba ni swibye swo sweka hi swona.

src_text: ""the lives, h ealth and wellbeing of thousands of people are still at risk.
tgt_text: ku nga ri khale khabinete yi hlambanye xiyimo xa khombo xa tiko hikwaro hi ku hlamula eka ndhambi.

src_text: the floods have caused great economic and social damage," he said.
tgt_text: presidente u hlamusele tindhambi tanihi khombo ra ximunhu leri rhambeke "matshalatshala ya matimba lamakulu mo phalala hi xihatla."

src_text: the port of durban, which is vital to south africa’s economy and is one of the largest and busiest shipping terminals on the continent, has been severely affected.
tgt_text: "vutomi, rihanyu ni riha nyu lerinene ra magidigidi ya vanhu swa ha ri ekhombyeni.

src_text: "the significance of the port of durban and rela ted infrastructure for the effective operation of the country’s economy means that this disaster has implications far beyond kzn," said the president.
tgt_text: tindhambi ti vange ku onha lokukulu ka ikhonomi ni ka vanhu," a vula tano.

src_text: progress has already been made in restoring operations at the port of durban, opening alternative routes for trucks to access the port terminals and clean up debris in the harbour.
tgt_text: mphalalo wa ndhambi ekzn ni le kapa vuxa allison cooper mfumo wu ta pfuna vaaki va le kwazulunatal ni le kapa vuxa ku pfuxelela vutomi ni makaya ya vona hi vuntshwa endzhaku ka tindhambi leti nga siya mafu mo landzelelana ni ku onha nhundzu ku nga ri khale eka swifundzankulu leswimbirhi.

src_text: operation vulindlela is opening the path to growth vukuzenzele unnamed the south african economy, like any other economy, cannot function, let alone grow, without efficient and competitive network industries.
tgt_text: operation vulindlela yi le ku pfuleni ka ndlela yo ya eku kuleni vukuzenzele unnamed ikhonomi ya afrikadzonga, tanihi ikhonomi yin’wana yihi kumbe yihi, yi nge tirhi, hambi ku ri ku kula, handle ka tiindasitiri ta tinetiweke leti tirhaka hi ku hetiseka na ku ka ti nga durhi.

src_text: these industries – which include electricity, water, transport and telecommunications – are the arteries through which the oxygen of the economy runs.
tgt_text: tiindasitiri leti – leti katsaka gezi, mati, vutleketli na vuhlanganisi bya tiqingho – i mithumukwana leyi yisaka moya wa okisijeni eka ikhonomi.

src_text: structural problems in these areas have long been cited as some of the main constraints on south africa’s economic growth.
tgt_text: swiphiqo leswi nga na xivumbeko eka tindhawu leti i khale swi ri karhi swi kombisiwa ku va swin’wana swa swikamanyetokulu eka ku kula ka ikhonomi ya afrikadzonga.

src_text: inefficiency and the high cost of network services are an impediment to doing business in the country.
tgt_text: ku nga tirhi hi ku hetiseka na nxavo wa le henhla wa vukorhokeri bya tinetiweke i xikanganyisi xa ku endla bindzu laha tikweni.

src_text: to address and overcome these challenges, we set up operation vulindlela in october 2020 as an initiative of the presidency and national treasury to accelerate structural reforms in these network industries.
tgt_text: ku lulamisa na ku hlula mitlhontlho leyi, hi sungule operation vulindlela hi nhlangula 2020 tanihi pfhumba ra hofisi ya phure sidente na vutamelankwama bya rixaka ro hatlisisa mipfuxeto leyi na xivumbeko eka indasitiri leta netiweke.

src_text: while the responsible government departments and entities drive these reforms, operation vulindlela monitors and identifies challenges and blockages.
tgt_text: loko tindzawulo ta mfumo leti nga na vutihlamuleri na mavandla swi fambisa mipfuxeto leyi, operation vulindlela yi veka tihlo na ku kuma mitlhontlho na swivangelo swo hluleka.

src_text: where needed, it facilitates technical support to departments.
tgt_text: laha swi lavekaka, yi humelerisa nseketelo wa xithekiniki eka tindzawulo.

src_text: the recent quarterly report outlines the progress made by operation vulindlela and the departments responsible for these reforms.
tgt_text: xiviko xa kotara na kotara lexa ha ku humaka xi andlala ku humelela loku endliweke hi operation vulindlela na tindzawulo leti nga na vutihlamuleri bya mipfuxeto leyi.

src_text: across government, our focus is on reforms that are fundamental and transformative; that reshape the way our economy works.
tgt_text: eka mfumo hinkwawo, nkongomo wa hina wu le ka mipfuxeto leyi yi nga ya nkoka na ku hundzuluxa; leyi yi vumbaka hi vuntshwa ndlela leyi ikhonomi ya hina yi tirhaka hayona.

src_text: this includes the auction of highdemand spectrum for mobile telecommunications, which was delayed for more than 10 years and finally completed in march.
tgt_text: leswi swi katsa fandisi ya swihondzo leswi laviwaka hi mpimo wa le henhla eka vuhlanganisi bya tiqingho ta tiselifoni, leswi nga hlwerisiwa kutlula malembe ya 10 leswi se swi nga fikisiwa emakumu hi nyenyankulu.

src_text: the release of new spectrum will improve connectivity and bring down broadband costs.
tgt_text: ku humesiwa ka swihondzo swintshwa swi ta antswisa ku hlanganisa na ku hunguta mixavo ya mahangalaselo.

src_text: the establishment of the national ports authority as a separate subsidiary of transnet last year had been delayed for more than 15 years.
tgt_text: ku tumbuluxiwa ka vulawuri bya mihlaluko bya rixaka tanihi xiyengentsongo xo hambana xa transnet lembe leri nga hela swi hlwerisiwile kutlula malembe ya 15. leswi swi ve goza ro sungula leri a ri laveka ro kotisa vutekaxiave bya sekitara leyi nga riki ya mfumo na ku engetela ku tirha hi ku hetiseka ka switichi swa ka hina swa le mihlalukweni.

src_text: this was the necessary first step towards enabling private sector participation and increasing the efficiency of our port terminals.
tgt_text: hi tlhele hi vuyisa sisiteme ya thonsi ra wasi, thonsi ra rihlaza na ku pfumaleka ka thonsi ro sungula kusukela hi 2014 ku tiyisisa leswaku ku va na vulanguteri byo antswa bya mati na risima ra mbhasiso wa mati ya thyaka.

src_text: we have also reinstated the blue drop, green drop and no drop system for the first time since 2014 to ensure better monitoring of water and wastewater treatment quality.
tgt_text: hi hangalase nxaxamelo wa swikili swa nkoka lowu pfuxetiweke, naswona i rosungula kusukela hi 2014. leswi swo va swin’wana swa swikombiso leswi hi ku kongomisa matshalatshala na ku langutisisa eka nhlayo leyitsongo ya mipfuxeto leyi rhangisiweke emahlweni, mafambiselo lama ya kotile ku susumeta ku humelela.

src_text: we have published an updated critical skills list, also for the first time since 2014. these are just some examples where, by focusing effort and attention on a limited number of priority reforms, this administration has been able to drive progress.

src_text: a liquid bulk fuel terminal operated by bp southern africa in east london has been sold to wasaa, an independent petrochemicals company.
